item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum tsa bzhugs so//
@##/ /de nas hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /las 'grub pa ston pa dang mthong ba sbyin pa dang 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par
'gyur ro/ /'on te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing su ra bis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / pad+ma dang ut+pa la dang / yungs
kar dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o/ /
de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing rig sngags 'chang ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /mchog gang 'dod cing gsol ba'i
mchog de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad do/ /gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te/

thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no/ /dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston

to/ /dbang phyug thob par bya na/ 'bras so ba stu ra sa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /grong thob par bya na/ tan tu li ya kha dang zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya

rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi snang bar bya na/ ske tshe dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /

nam mkha' la 'gro bar bya na/ sha ta pad tri ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na/ shi li dang tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / tu ruSh+ka rnams til dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo bo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po stsol bar mdzad do/ /

thams cad du mchod pa 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma

grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gter bsgul na de nas don yod pa chen po'i spyan sngar brjod par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa so sor bstan pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ grub pa rigs sngags 'chang gi rnam

par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngogs su zhugs pa

rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams rnam par sel ba/ don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa

thams cad 'phrog pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de/ dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog tu skyid pa/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rmad du byung

ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang / bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun du byams pa'i sems la

mnyam par gzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o/ /bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen po'i sgyu

ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o/ /gi wang dang / spr-i ka dang / pu shel tse dang / tsan+dan dang / ldong ros dang / shing kun dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / ru rta dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste/ phye mar byas nas/

thams cad zhib mor btags la/ ga bur dang / gla rtsis bsgos te/ snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis bcos pa/ nye'u shing dang / bil ba dang / me tog brgya pa dang / puSh+ka ra dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / sa mu sta dang / pra

puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang bar sbyin par bya ste drug cha lhag mar lus pa dang / snyigs ma bre gang dang 'o ma'i snyigs ma bor te/ til mar srang gnyis la rtag tu btso bar bya'o/ /legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang /

dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang / til mar btso ba'i cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa srung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas

brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'dis/ lus de mi snang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do/ /ngag thos

la reg par mi byed do/ /gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo / /dpral bar thig le byas nas/ yan lag dang / nying lag rnams la reg ste/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te/

skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang / skra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor

los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/ /reg pa tsam gyis tshe bskal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lus rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye ste 'dug go/ /gang du 'dod par 'jug par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub

pa'i dus su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas na/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khor grub pa ston par byed do/ /til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na/ nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do/ /lus la byugs na mi snang bar

ston par byed do/ /mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ yan lag dang / nying lag la thig le byas na/ lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do/ /'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o/ /yungs kar la bzlas te/ lan cig bskus sam/

dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na/ dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar byed do/ /gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang / bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go/ /rang nyid se gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don

par byed na/ slar yang snod nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa rang rang gi gnas su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams dkyil 'khor dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub bo/ /de nas seng ge'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na/

mi yi seng ge chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ger kun tu gnas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me 'bar ba ston par byed

do/ /phag gi khrag dang sbyar na/ phag gi gzugs su ston par byed de/ shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed do/ /glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa

tsam gyis rta mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed de ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do/ /ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ /khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nya'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i gzugs

su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang bsres nas sbyar na/ sbrul chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ra'i khrag dang bsres pas/ ra chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dang / phye ma dang / rtsa ba dang bcas pa

dang / 'dab ma dang me tog dang sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyis lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kar la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyis thig le bya'o/ /mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byug pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ma mo'i tshogs dang

bcas pas yongs su bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs na/ 'khor chen po'i dbus su/

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kar de nam mkha' la gtor na/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na/ pad+ma chen po'i char 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ut+pa

la sngon po'i khu bas sbyor na/ ut+pa la sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong bar

'dod pa de lta de ltar lha'i til mar rnying pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ de lta de ltar de dang de nyid kyi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te/ yid la rjes su dran par byas na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid

du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do/ /lag pas snod la gzung na/ snod sna tshogs pa bton par byed do/ /lag pas bum pa la gzung na/ bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do/ /rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na/ gang du rdo ba la rkang pa

bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gtun shing la byugs na/ rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs na/

ma mo'i lha rnams kyi so so tha dad pa'i rdul bzung ste til mar dang lhan cig sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na/ lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o/ /de nas blo 'phel bar byed pa

ni/ til mar dang / 'o ma lhan cig zos na/ blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed do/ /zhag bdun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do/ /

zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas/ bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs pa dang / skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / pad+ma'i

kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po ches srung gi stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag sum cu so lnga'i sbyor bas

nam mkha' lding chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyor bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ klu'i

rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos yongs su bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi bsgul ba/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i

'os su gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rig sngags

'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig grub pa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi nye bar bgrod par bya ba

ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o/ /til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis/ til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na/ byugs

pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nam mkha' la 'gro

zhing / rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /blta na sdug pa'i 'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mod la 'gyur ro/ /

dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms so/ /mdung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /

'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dbal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsa'i rma dang / mgul pa 'gags pa dang / rna ba'i rtsa nad dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / dmu chu dang / skran dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa

nyid la yang / mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugs pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo/ /til mar gyis nad thams cad sel ba de bzhin du/ rtsib logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho

ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do/ /nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / gso dpyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lus

rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par bsrung ba dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa la yang / reg pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tshom med do/ /byad mi bzad pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang /

sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mche ba'am/ sbrul go Na sa dang / sdig pa yang rung / srin bu dang / phye ma leb gdug pa'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po'am/ sbrul gyis mthong ba'i

dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA la hA la'i gdug pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang / rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / sdong bu'i dug dang / 'dab ma'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs

kyi dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /til mar reg pa tsam gyis/ lam mchog dang / lam gol bar song ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba yang rung / bsad par 'os par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /

bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gzeb dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rgol ba gang yin pa yang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams

cad 'joms so/ /rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to/ /g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du'am/ phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro/ /mkhas pas mig la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad

du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ nad thams cad

rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ mod la thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang /

dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang /

mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / zhe sar bya ba dang / bla mar byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ras ris kyi sku gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ mthas klas

pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /ras gru bzhi pa gru bzhir cha

mnyam pa/ shin tu thags bzang ba/ shin tu gsar ba/ shin tu 'jam pa mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra dang bral ba'am/ yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma smyung bar gnas pas/ lhag

ma ma yin pa'i tshon snod gsar par bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pas/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dang po ni zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan

pa/ 'od dpag med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/ phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed pa/ tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs

kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu skra 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o/ /zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i steng du/

sku phyed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa bya ste/ sku ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can/ dbu skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil ba/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang / gnyis pas

tho ba 'bar ba can bya'o/ /phyag gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar 'bar ba'i snyen pa can no/ /gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/ g.yas pa na'o/ /g.yon pas khro bo chen po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas

pa dbugs 'byin pa'i rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o/ /rgya mtsho'i snying por ri rab la gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos

dkris pa bya'o/ /nya dang chu srin dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/ pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar pos gcal du bkram pa/ dang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us khyab pa bya'o/ /g.yas logs su

lha mo sgrol ma/ dbu cung zad dud pa/ thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/ /dkar sham chen mo thal mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas

pa bya'o/ /srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'bar pa'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la blta bzhin pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan

par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/ zhal khro gnyer can drag po/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i snying por pus mo g.yas pa btsugs pa/ ral gri dang / dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan

thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang ba/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba bya'o/ /lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po

dang / gshin rje dang / chu lta dang / lus ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te/ mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyu'i rgyab tu/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa bya ste/ yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rnam

par bkra bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du/ rig sngags 'chang bya ste/ pus mo btsugs pa me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / lag na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o/ /zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnas su pho nya mo bya ste/

zur mig can drag mo/ lag na ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba phyag thal mo sbyar ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bya'o/ /ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi bya ba yongs su mthar phyin nas/ byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par

bya'o/ /de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar/ de'i spyan sngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga

rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du/ gtsang mas zas mi za bar/ de'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos phul nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad

bya'o/ /'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas grub pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis/ gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub pa bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams

'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang / bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nad dang 'jigs pa thams

cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de yang phan pa byed par 'gyur te/ me tog gam/ bdug

pa dang / dri'am/ byug pa'am/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byed pa'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang bkod pa'am/ rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/

dge bsnyen mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug

yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyangs shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba brjes nas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams

bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ don yod pa'i khro bo lcags kyu'i gzungs 'di yang mtha'

dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo

thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par 'os par

yang 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du thogs pa med pa mkhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil

'khor/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad par bgyi'o/ /khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam pa/ shin tu tshad la bab cing

legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ 'jam shing mnyen pa dang ldan pa'o/ /tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/ /sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye/ /sgo bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes pa/ /khor yug

them skas bzhi dang ldan/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang / /shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab/ /khru yi tshad du bya ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang / /mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'i/ /

pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis bya/ /lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang / /ge sar pad+ma'i khor yug tu/ /snying por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la/ /khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o/ /drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /ral gri dang ni dgra sta'i phyag /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan

cing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lus phyed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas dkris pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa/ nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa la/ grwa grwar 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/

drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal 'jigs su rung ba 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa'o/ /nang gi ri mo la/ lcags sgrog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i

tshon rtsis bya'o/ /ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du/ pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o/ /ri mo gsum pa'i nang du/ 'khor lo'i rnam pa'o/ /mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o/ /ral gri dang / zhags

pa dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / tsa ba la dang / mdung rtse gnyis/ dung dang / tir+ya dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / tho ba dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / mda' bo che dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / rtse lnga dang / par+sha sU

la dang / rdo rje zur gsum dang / pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ /kha khyer gyi rnam pas brgyan pa la kha khyer gyi phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun

mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /shar gyi gnas su/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya'o/ /lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag

rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o/ /byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag par bri'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal po sgo ru bri bar bya'o/ /lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so/ /nub tu nor bu rigs kyi khro bo'o/ /byang

du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo bri bar bya'o/ /khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs 'bar ba'i snying po/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o/ /ri rab la gnas pa/ skyil mo krung phyed pa lus cung zad bskum pa bya'o/ /phyi'i ri

mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / me tog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dag go/ /khor yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu brgyan pa'o/ /lhab lhub dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas kun

nas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o/ /ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci 'byor pa dang / gtor ma'i las kyi cho gas 'byor pa dang / rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa gang ba dang / pog phor dang / bum bu dang / bum pa dang /

gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog kun nas gcal du dgram mo/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar/ mchod yon dang /

zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo/ /dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i bum pa byas nas/ mkhas pas dar bzang po bcings te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri chab kyis gang ba'i bum pa

dar gyis bcings pa gzhag par bya'o/ /mkhas pas sgo dang / sgo ru ni/ bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi'i ro dang / gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum la/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / zan dang / mchog gi bza' ba ma nyams pas/ shin tu mdzes pa'i

gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du/ 'khur ba dang / 'khur ba zlum po nyid dang / snum 'khur dang / be Ti ma ka dang / sa rA'i la du dang / mud ga'i la du dang / hwags dang / kha y+YA ni bzang po rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma'i las la/ khor yug tu me tog

bzang po dgram zhing / phreng bas brgyan par bya'o/ /'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /'bras bu'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ne'u gsing sngo bsangs dang / lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste gzhag par bya'o/ /khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / de bzhin du/ a ga

ru dang / tsan+dan spr-i ka dang / tu ruSh+ka dang / dpal gyis dkris pa dang / gu gul dang / kun tu ru dang / sbrang rtsi dang / hwags sbyar ba'i bdug pa ste/ bdug pa 'di dag dbul bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog phor gzhag par

bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bya ste/ gtsug tor bcing zhing / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o/ /rig sngags dkyil 'khor mchog mthong ba dang /

phyag bya zhing / bskor ba nyid dang / dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o/ /rtag tu bsang ba'i las byas te/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa yang bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshad ma las/ da gos pa 'di dag thams cad byas nas/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang

gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o/ /rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'gro ba bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde ba can du/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te

skye bar the tsom med do/ /lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / cho ga zhib mo'i dngos

grub dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang / mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / dgra thams cad bzlog pa dang / mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa

thams cad dang / thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyal po dang / blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun du bla

na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ljongs thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid du yang dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze rnams dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med

dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu tshig btsan pa dang / rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon par bsrungs pa dang / skabs gsum gyi dbang po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang / rdo rje snying po bdag nyid chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug

dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la yang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te

the tsom mi bya'o/ /yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas

pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no/ /'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha

ma yin no/ /rtag tu skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan par the tsom med do/ /'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin

te/ ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / khro bo lcags kyu'i las brgya phrag stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos bya'o/ /thams cad du lan cig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las

thams cad bya'o/ /bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags kyu'i gzungs kyi kun tu

snang bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las phyung ngo / /gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so/ /'od zer gyi snang ba gang gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab

pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa'i don dang / lha'i dri dang mthun par gsal ba'i dri dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug la phab bo/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gsal zhing rgya che ba/ dri 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ dza ti'i 'bras bu dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i lha'i chus yongs su dbang bskur te/

thigs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhu ba'i mig 'bras las lhung ba'i chu skar ma las rab tu lhung ba'i gos/ de lta bu'i dpral bar thig le 'bar ba nyi ma dang / smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zer sa la lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo / /

pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgya stong phrag kha bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzum pas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru ltar mnyen pa byung bar gyur to/ /bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi

tshad lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis/ chu'i thigs pa 'dab ma mnyam pa/ bai DUr+ya mchog tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+ma kha bye ba de mthong nas/ thugs ngo mtshar dang / ya mtshan skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems dpa' chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lags so/ /rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' chen

po bdag gis/ ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' dag pa chen po/ khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tsom med par mdzod cig ces so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen

po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / lha rnams yod de/ de bdag gis

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /de'i mthu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthong ngo / /de'i mthus pad+ma 'di byung ngo / /rig

sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bdag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya che zhing che ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ byis pa'i cha byad bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob par

byed bzhin du 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags

pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / lha rnams smros shig /gang gis smras pa tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa med par dkyil 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya rnams rjes su mthun par phyogs

te gnas par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas par byed do/ /sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang phyis kyang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /

las thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho gar yang 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang zhing / phyi bzhin phyi bzhin lhan cig rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i don du/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ bzhin 'dzum

zhing mig mi 'dzums pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byam thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rab 'byam rgya

mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / rang

sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub pa grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub pa rnams dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M bi ma le/ bi ma la gar+b+he/ bi ma la am+bu dza pad+me sUr+ya brtsa se/ sa ha

sra rasmi ki ra Ne ma hA ra smi dz+wA la a ba b+hA Shi te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra pad+mo da ri pad+ma gar+b+he/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ su bi ma la am+bu dza bi ma le ma Ni ka Na ka badzra bai DUr+ya in+d+ra nI la ma ra ka ta/ pad+ma rA ga bi bi d+ha ma hA ma Ni rat+nA la~M kr-i ta sha rI re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/ pa ra pa ra pa

ra shu pA she d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta bai ro tsa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya ad+hiSh+Thi te/ ku la sa ma ya pa ri pU ra Ni/ ba ra ba ra/ badzra dz+wA la mA lA gar+b+he/ badzre badzre badzra a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me hU~M hU~M/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni tsin+tA ma Ni pA sha d+ha ra/ hu ru hu ru pad+ma pad+ma gau re pad+ma pA Ni bar de/ a mo g+ha pad+me/ o~M pad+mi ni

pad+ma ma Ni badzra d+ha rA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la sA nA mya sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ma hA bi pu la b+hu dze/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru b+hu ri Ni/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta bIr+ya rA dze pra sa ra pra sa ra san+ta bi ma le/ sarba bid+yA maN+Da la de ba tA na ma skr-i te/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya tA ra ya/ sa man+ta

pa ri pU ra Ni sarba bo d+hi satwa a b+hi She tsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha a b+hi Shik+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya sa maM sarba bid+yA maN+Da la ku la/ sa ma ya a b+hi She kaiHsarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni bar de/ pad+ma gau re pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+b+he/ hU~M hU~M/ badzre badzre/ badzre pad+me ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a mo g+ha ba ra de/

sarbA sA pa ri pU ra Ni sarba pA pa duHkha pra sha ma ni/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya sid+d+hi sA d+ha ya bi ma le hU~M phaT/ o~Mb ra de pad+ma b+hu dze na ma stu te pad+ma su te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi

pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yod zhags pa'i snying po rigs kyi rgyal po gzungs chen po kun nas rnam par snang bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa'i de ma thag gi 'og tu pad+ma ze 'bru dang bcas pa'i ge sar gsal

bar rnam par bye ste/ dper na grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig gi sgo bya nas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du/ lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa 'od mtha' yas pa phyag bzhi pa rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag na pad+ma/ don yod zhags pa'i ngo bo'i zhags pa'i phyag dang / yid bzhin gyi

nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phyag dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag /spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa zla ba'i cod pan 'chang ba zhi ba/ zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i zhal/ sku la 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po/ pad+ma dang / seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs

pa/ pad+ma kha bye ba'i snying por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

spyan sngar 'dug ste/ mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sems can dag pa chen po khyod ci'i phyir mig mi 'dzums par blta/ mchog ci don du gnyer bzhin du 'khod ces so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya dang / sngags

dang / dam tshig gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyon cig /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thams cad du/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing /

khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no/ /ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no/ /tuN+DA dang / kar sham

dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pad+ma rigs mdzes ma dang / lha mo chen mo ki lI ki lI dang / rdo rje pho nya mo dang / dri med byed ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan ma dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer can dang / lha mo pad+ma rab snang ma dang / pad+ma spyod byed ma dang / rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo chen mo don yod pa'i phyag dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / dpal mo dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / dbyangs can ma dang / ral gcig ma spyan stong pa/ phyag stong pa/ dbu stong pa/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dang / rin chen lha mo dang / rin chen 'byung gnas

dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang / rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang / lha mo chen mo phyag rgya'i dbang phyug dang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / hu hwa bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg dang / zhi ba'i las dang / lha mo rigs mdzes ma dang / rig sngags 'chang chen mo rdo rje mdzes ma nyid dang /

phyag na 'khor lo grub pa dang / de bzhin du ral gri bzang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / khro bo nyid dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / dus kyi mtshan mo dang / zhal rnam par 'gyur ma dang / mche ba gtsigs ma dang / ser skya ma nyid dang / rang gsal ma dang / phyag na rin chen ma nyid dang / sa'i

dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / de bzhin du rdzas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lha mo dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang / a gri Ni dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa'i lha dang / thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lha mo khyod dang / gsang

sngags thams cad la dbang sgyur ma dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang / bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang / rigs kyi gsang

sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po nges par sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid du dpral ba'i smin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung ba/ skar ma'i rnam pa dang mtshungs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur

pa'o/ /zhes las sna tshogs dang / dbyangs can gang yin pa 'di 'chang bar byed do/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang du blangs nas gsungs so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par skyob pa thob pa dang / de bzhin du cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa dang /

phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed do/ /don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang / thams cad du rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag

rgya'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang / spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig nyid kyang 'di dran pa tsam gyis thams cad thob par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur bar the tsom

med do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dam tshig la kun tu gnas par byed do/ /de lta bas na/ 'bad pa thams cad kyis zung cig /de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / shAkya'i rgyal pos rig sngags kyi rgyal por lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis ming kun tu gzigs shing thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/ rdo rje'i dngos grub dngos grub chen po/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos

grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs dang nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub/ mchog gi dang po rdo rje'i rigs su bstan pa/ rdo rje rtse mo chen po'i lha

dang / de bzhin du rdo rje sa 'og dngos grub kyi phyir rdo rje phreng ba rim par phye ba'i grangs dang rdo rje mchu'i mchog gi dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dang / pad+ma mdzes pa dang / de bzhin du'am/ ming smos pa tsam gyi mod la rjes su 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do/ /de

bzhin du rdo rje dbang po dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ rtag tu shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang / ming gang gi mchog 'dzin pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu rnam par

gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung ston par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos

so/ /g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem mo/ /lha'i me tog gi char bab ste/ 'di lta ste/ zla ba mdog mdzes dang / dri med mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / man+dA

ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ut+pa la dmar po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya nar dang / pun+nA ga dang / gan+d+ha ga pAr+Shi ka dang / kon+ta dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / pa lA sha dang / mthon ka dang /

mthon ka chen po dang / tsam+pa ka dang / sau gan+d+hi ka dang / san+d+ha bA ra Na dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / sna ma dang / yU thi ka dang / na ba mA li ka dang / ta ra Na dang / ma ru ba ka dang / ku bya ka'i me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang / tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas btsos pa'i lha'i gos kyi char

'bab pa'i don dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan cha'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i gser gyi me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i dri tsan+dan dang / ta mA la dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / lha'i gos dang / dri bzang

pos bsgos pa'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i dri chab kyi char 'bab pa'i don dang / ma dkrol bar nam mkha'i mthil du rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang / gos dang / rin po che sna tshogs

'tsher bar byed pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i mu tig gi do shal dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan zla gam can dang / mu tig dmar po dang / ka shi ka'i gos sna tshogs pa 'thor bar byed par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab

'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus lha'i gzhal yas khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i gos dang me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba

dang / byug pa rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gdugs sna tshogs pa rnams nam mkha'i mthil du kun tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i

'khor la mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur te mchod pa chen po byed par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong bar gyur to/ /dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa rnams yang dag par mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kun tu yang dag par bye'o/ /lha'i gzhal yas khang sna tshogs pa byung bar gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas yang

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rdo rje gsor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas

bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu 'bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dngos grub kyi mtshan ma che

zhing che ba snang ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mthong bar snang ba dang / cho

'phrul che zhing che ba snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig sngags chen po 'byung bar snang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ 'di ci'i

mthus sngon gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/ 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhig yang dag par snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems la the tsom de skyes par gyur pas/ de nges par bstan du gsol/ zhu ba lung ston par 'gyur ba gang gis/ bdag gi

dogs pa rnam par sel ba dang / som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye ru gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nges

par bstan par bya'i nyon cig /lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do/ /don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ kun tu snang ba'i dkyil

'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par snang bar byed do/ /de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam

par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo / /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang / ming bzung ba tsam gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul phra

rab dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba dang / mtshan gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags

rim par phye ba dang / snying po'i mthu rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas

pa de rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / gsang sngags

chen po rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du/ snying po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba la rab tu zhugs shing dbang bsgyur ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying por gyur pa gcig pu'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang chu yang dag par 'byung ba bzhin

no/ /snying po gcig po 'di/ rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /des na lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ kun nas rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rgyu des na/ rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ ming lan cig gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi drung du/ gsang ba thams

cad kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rab tu ston pa dang / mtshan gzung bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po

yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' legs so zhes bya ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub

rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kyi snying po dang / ting

nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su song bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rjes su sbyor zhing dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje

de bzhin du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ de bas na/ de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu

chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ dri dang byug pa dang / rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang / lan cig tsam gyis kyang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi snying po gsang ba

dang / mchod pa rnams byas pa dang / mnyes par byas pa dang / klog par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rim

par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha de rnams thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams

rnams su 'bros par byed do/ /yams thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad dang / gtam ngan gyi 'jigs

pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /gdug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed do/ /mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par

grol bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /

srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do/ /thams cad du cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang

sngags dang phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba don yod

pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po

byed par 'gyur ro/ /bkra shis dang yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gshed byed dang / byad stems dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / sems bsgyur ba dang / sbod gtong gi sbyor ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed

do/ /dug dang / sbyar dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do/ /rims rnams thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / mtshan gcig pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / grang ba'i rims

dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mgo gzer dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / mig nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / ma ro tsa ka dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / bshang ba

'khyil ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gcin nad dang / gsud pa dang / lto ba na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /

sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / me dbal dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad byabs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di de ltar go

skabs yangs la rgya che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab/ rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po/

dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang / bkra shis pa gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa thos nas tshim pa dang / mgu

ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shin tu dkon no/ /bcom ldan 'das rig

sngags kyi rgyal po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang

mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i bar nas nges par byung ba ni/ rig pa 'dzin

pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa ched du 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur ba las gzhan ma yin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs

gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das nyin mtshan du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi skad cig kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ste slar yang snga dro'am/ nyin mo'am/ mtshan

mo'am/ zla ba'am/ lo re yang rung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad brjed par 'gyur/ yongs su dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su dor bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no/ /lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu

rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des ni/

lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi thos shing mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des ni/ lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du/ rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang

sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po dang / gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag tu son par 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du song zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rjes su song zhing / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags rim

par phye ba dang / phyag rgya yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bo dang thu bor 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na/ sras kyi gtso bor dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston par

'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni/ de'i yon tan dang / phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /

rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nas/ rang

gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par bltas nas/ don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to/ /oM a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni bar da pad+me dz+wa la

dz+wa la na b+hu dze hU~M/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying po'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i de ma thag pa de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/

bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi 'dzums par blta zhing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po de la yang / rig sngags kyi rgyal pos spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags

kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang / nags dang 'brog dgon par bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ /phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /des na dus gsum

du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka'

ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba 'di legs so legs so/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ro/ /nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu mthun pas don

yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal pos spyi bo'i gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /

'di ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o/ /oM a mo g+ha bai ro tsa na ma hA mu drA ma Ni pad+me dz+wa la pra bar+d+ha ya hU~M/ phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs nas

mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba gsum byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rig

sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par gzigs nas/ ji ltar da ltar yid la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do/ /oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi She kaM ma Ni badzre sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hU~M/ rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon

par dbang bskur ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs rnam par thar

pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo / /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo / /rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo / /don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul

pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlobs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pU dza ma Ni pad+ma badzre ta thA ga ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta pra sa ra hU~M/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa

sna tshogs pa du ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo / /lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyis brlabs

kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag par mthong ngo / /de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug las mngon du phyogs nas stan la 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad

par/ phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa dam tshig dang rjes su mthun pa mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan

pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te rig pa'i rgyal po 'di/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tsha sangs

rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / 'khras dang / yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /dgra thams

cad rab tu 'dul bar byed do/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /char med na char 'bebs so/ /rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba ldog par byed do/ /mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /nad thams

cad ldog par byed do/ /gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed do/ /bsod nams sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga bklags pas 'grub pa'i dngos grub gsungs so/ /de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par

'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan mtha' dag dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang dkyil

'khor dang gzhal med khang mtha' dag mthong ngo / /de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro/ /dang po rmi lam

mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro'o/ /gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor brtags pa mthong ngo / /

gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa yang mthong ngo / /der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de/ dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba yang so sor thob bo/ /rig sngags dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab

tu thob bo/ /gsum par rmi lam mthong ba na/ rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / gzhal med khang rgya chen po

dang bcas pa mthong ngo / /de la yang rdo rje 'chang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin par byed do/ /mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/ /rig sngags thams cad dang / don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i dngos grub chen po dang / mngon par

dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub chen po dang / dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo/ /bzhi par rmi lam mthong ba na/ nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang cho ga zhib mo dang / rang gi rgyan dang

dkyil 'khor mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad lha'i tshogs dang dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i lha dang / rig pa'i rgyal po yang mthong ste/ de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / cho ga dang bcas pa rjes su thob ste/

mngon par dbang bskur ba yang rab tu thob bo/ /dngos grub chen po dang mchog sbyin yang so sor thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang /

po Ta la ka'i ri'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor kyi lha rnams mthong ste/ de la yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems

can de la rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang gzungs kyi dngos grub so sor thob po/ /rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur te/ mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad

dang / dngos grub kyang rjes su stsol bar byed do/ /mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so sor thob bo/ /drug par rmi lam mthong ba na/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong ba mthong ngo / /gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i tshogs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mthong ste de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang dam tshig dang mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor thob ste/ rig sngags

thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa so sor thob bo/ /bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo / /de la yang de bzhin

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ rang nyid kyi phyag gis bzung nas/ rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis dam tshig dang /

phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes su stsol bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do/ /nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gcig por 'gyur ro/ /skye ba brje ba

'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa nye bar gnas shing dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye ba'i skal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do/ /thams cad du yang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do/ /thams cad du yang / rang gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs

pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do/ /bskal ba brgya stong phrag gi bar du yang / sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil

'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gnas thams cad yongs su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i

dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla na med pa bklags pas 'grub pa'o/ /de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i

sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /gang dang gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rjes su bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de yang nyi ma bdun gyis rang gi lus de yang rang gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste mdun du nye bar 'dug ste sbyin par byed pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa

nye bar bsags pa 'di dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdag zhum pa dang 'khrugs pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag par smra bar byed cing mi snang bar byed do/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar po la

mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do/ /nad thams cad la byabs pas yongs su grol bar byed do/ /mtshon chas sam rma bya'i sgros sam/ mda' yis yang rung ste nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /gdon thams cad

la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i mgul bar bcings te lan bdun du bya ba par bya'o/ /gu gul bdug pa sbyin par bya/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas pas gang dang gang gi

gdon gyis zin par gyur pa de yang rang gi lus kyis nges par 'gro ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug nas thams cad smra bar byed do/ /rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed do/ /bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rtsod pa dang /

'gyed pa rnams thams cad la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan dang / sbyin sreg gis yongs su grol lo/ /khar mur te/ rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so/ /dug 'thungs pas chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par

bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis zos pa la byab par bya ste/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang byad stems dang / gsang sngags dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsres pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam
