'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus

mngon du bstan pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyed dang tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha dang / klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o/ /lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/

sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod pa bya'o/ /mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na/ zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na/ rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /'dre gdon thams cad gdul bar 'dod na rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la

mchod do/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra gzhom par 'dod na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar bar 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa'i lag la mchod do/ /mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me

shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /blo thabs mthon por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur

du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lus kyi bgegs ma rungs pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na bum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /stag dang 'phar spyang dang dom dred dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal

po'i bgegs las thar bar 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /bu dang bu mo dang g.yog 'khor gyi phyir ni shel gyi gdub 'khor thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+mo dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na pad+mo sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du

mthong bar 'dod na pad+mo dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /drang srong gi lam mngon par 'grub par 'dod na sprin sna lnga thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /tshangs par skye bar 'dod

na ril ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs gzhan gyi dgra phyir rgol ba bsal bar 'dod na ral gri dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /dge ba'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug

par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /lha 'dre thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thod pa'i 'khar ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /tshig gi spobs pa gya nom pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams rtag par

'ongs te srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'dod na 'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen

bkur byed cing brtse bar sems par 'dod na thal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod do/ /skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du rtag par de bzhin

gshegs pa'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /mang du thos pa'i shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /

da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas

spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ /de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang deng mdor bsdus

nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dad pa'i sems kyis gzungs 'di zung la 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher yongs su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /gzungs 'di khams gsum

gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas gzungs 'dis yongs su gsos na mi 'tsho ba gang yang med do/ /rig sngags chen mo 'dis shing skam po la btab na yang yal ga dang lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu skye bar

'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges par med do/ /rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs dang mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa ma yin na tha na 'di'i ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon sum du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha dang mi dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khor

mang po khyed rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la skur pa btab par gyur na gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba

btab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzungs 'di la the tshom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na gang zag de ni phan yon chen po dang gtan du 'bral bar 'gyur pas bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ngan 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med de/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong /

chos kyang mi thos/ dge 'dun yang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi

dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas bka' yang dag par blangs nas mngon par sgrub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi

'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chen po 'di smras so/ /na mo bud d+ha gu ra be/ na mo d+harma ma ha te/ na maHsang g+ha tra yA Ni tri pu pi sA ta tam namaH/ rig sngags 'di bton na kha na ma tho ba thams cad yongs su 'byang

bar 'gyur/ bdud spong bar byed/ bgegs rnams sel bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nas sangs rgyas la phyag lan re bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye ba thams cad

du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes pa re re'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di smras so/ /sin+ti te du soSh+Ta/ adz+nyA mi te atuSh+Ta/ si na khi ta ba li

tiSh+TA/ ya mi dz+nyA ta o d+huSh+Ta/ ku la ti maSh+Ta khiSh+Ta swA hA/ rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud byas te gang du na bar gdags par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa

yin pas deng bdag gis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /

'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di ni yang dag par bden te mi bden pa ci yang med do/ /byang

chub sems dpa' 'di'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus bsregs pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/ 'jim

pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du bcad nas sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lan re brjod na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /byad stems kyis phog par

gyur na gu gul dang ga bur cha mnyam par byas te/ khron pa'i chu gtsang ma bre gang dang bsres nas bskol te phul gang tsam lus pa blangs nas/ mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyis

zin par gyur na bca' lga'i phye ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mi ma rungs pa dag gis rku bshams nas gnod pa byas par gyur na sa gtsang ma'am bag zan nam/ spra tshil la pha rol po'i gzugs byas te mig stong

pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re brjod de lan re gtubs nas pha rol gyi ming nas brjod de/ bsregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na pha rol po dga' zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing

byams par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mig nad kyis btab ste/ mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/ ldongs par gyur tam/ mi gsal bar gyur tam/ ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khebs te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu

ru ra 'bru ma re zhib tu btags te/ 'thag pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar du bu btsas pa dang / khyi dang phag rnams bsnyen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de/ sbrang rtsi dkar po dang / mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar bya'o/ /

'o ma de yang bu khye'u btsas pa'i nu zho rung gi bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo / /sman de sbyar zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar du khang pa dben par rlung bsrungs na mig gi 'bras bu

skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal brgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab ste myos par gyur na stag dang / 'phar ba dang spyang ki'i pags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bgos na sos par 'gyur ro/ /

gal te sbrul gyis zin par gyur na gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spabs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzer thabs ma rungs pas snying la gzer te 'chi la thug na ka pyi ta lag pa tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang dang sbyar te/ bskol

nas phul phyed lus pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste cig car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman de yang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o/ /ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyun ring du na bar gyur na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te

snar bdug par bya'o/ /yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mid du bcug na sos par 'gyur te/ sha dang / chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / tshig ngan pa rnams bsrung dgos so/ /yang na ba bla dang / yungs

kar dang lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna subs par gyur tam/ rka lag sdud mi nus par gyur na

ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na yang sos par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na til

mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na yang smran 'di 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du snying ga gzer te mi bzod par gyur na de ni ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin

pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ ci tsam 'byor ba byin nas glon du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /sha chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga bsrung dgos so/ /mes tshig par gyur na ba lang gi lci ba dron mo la lan nyi shu

rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /srin bu khong par zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na srin bu thag pa gcus pa bzhin

du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shu chen byung ba la leng se'u hwa brdungs pa'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du blugs na rtsa ba rang 'byung bar 'gyur bas mod la 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /mig tu sbrang ma zhugs te na bar gyur na bong bu'i rtug pa

btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshan mo mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lto ba na bar gyur na khron pa'i chu gtsang ma'i nang du lan tshwa ma grugs pa 'brum bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phul phyed 'thungs

na phan par 'gyur ro/ /mig tshag por gyur tam/ mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/ ling tog byung bar gyur na ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ de'i nang du khar ba'i dong tshe gcig mtshan gcig sbangs nas yang lan

bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshan mo 'byung 'jug gi tshe 'jigs dngangs nas mi bde bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags na 'jigs

shing dngang ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang bral ba kho nar ma zad kyi bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po se'u'i shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs

te/ mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzla zhing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de'ang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so/ /shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad

sngags kyis btab ste/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags nas g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang 'bel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma'am yal ga yang rung snye dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyis kar ba mar

yang dag pa dang / sbrang rtsi dkar po dang ba zho bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o/ /nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing / dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na sngags mkhan de rang gis

mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/ bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o/ /gi'u wang srang

gcig bai DUr+ya'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na/ lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin dang mi dang mi ma yin

pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ lag pa la bskus nas btson cha la byugs na btson cha rang grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyo shug

chu dang me bzhin du mi 'dum par 'gyur na bya dur pa'i mjug ma blangs te/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams

pa dang bkur bar 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa'am thal ba'am/ bye ma gtsang ma blangs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyur ro/ /chu gtsang

ma la sngags kyis btab ste/ 'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thugs mi thub bo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ sha ra ma hA sha ra/ tu lu ma hA tu lu/ oM ku me ha ni sha pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la la

zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te/ mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na khyed kyis mig btsums nas lus drang por bsrang ste/ sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas mig phye shig dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snod

bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma stong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma dang rnga yab dang lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o/ /chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te

gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi ngang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bca' bar bya ste/ de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /zas zos zin nas mig

btsums te sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyi lhag ma yang spang bar bya'o/ /zas zos te ltor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo thos pa 'dzin par

'gyur ba'i gzugs ni 'di yin te/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsang g+hA ya/ na mo A da n+ni ye/ u ka tsi du u ka tsi du/ ma ti la li/ la lu te na mi ti na mi swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor

byas nas mtshams bcad de lus bsrungs nas khar ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu cig khron pa'i chu gtsang mas bkang ste/ mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas na gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba cig 'ong bar 'gyur bas 'ong ba'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems

bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/ dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa rgyud

pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba cig lhung bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes pa skyed par bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/ bam po gnyis pa/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/ deng bcom ldan

'das kyis bdag la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang / bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang / bcing ba mtha' dag gcad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bar bzhed pa lags pas deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi

ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/ dus tha ma'i sems can rnams yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral ba nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dus lnga brgya

tha ma la yul lam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags

kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin

thams cad kyis gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par

'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang

'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/ deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la bde bar bgyid pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad par

'tshal te/ bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs

kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyes pa lags pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang /

yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / shes rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/ lha dang / mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/ gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga'

zhing thams cad kyis spyi bo btud de phyag bgyid par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur gang ci smras kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te/ de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te/ rang nyid kyi mthu ni ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang /

bde bar bya ba dang / las kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas/ khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog

par mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas/ yum

zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bas ri po Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing / sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi grub par bgyi bar bshams pa las/ de'i

tshe bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad so sor gyes par gyur pas/ gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams

pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa'i yum

zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i sngags 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo\u0f85 mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/

na mo ma hAs+thA maHprAp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta saM g+hA ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka pra b+hA a ba b+hA si ta mUr+t+ta ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la a laM kA ra d+hA ra NI/ b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/

sarba lo ka u pa sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa ma be Sha biSh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hur+b+hu ba/ ma hA lo ka ka ra Na/ nA tha ma sid+he mi ra b+ha drA binA sha na ka rA ya rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka sha sa ka sa mA shwA sa na ka ra ka sarba pA pa durga te

pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta sam+ba da na ka ra he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma lo ki saM b+hu ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka dza Ta mu ku TA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/ ma Ni ka na ka sha ta/ badzra baiDUr+yA laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a mi tA b+ha si na ka mA lA laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na/ la ri tsa na ma hA du na/ na

ran ri sha ta sa sha sra/ a b+hi la ShI ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yan+t+raM kle sha ka ba d+ha/ a ba bad+ha bi bi d+ha satwa saM sA ra tsA ra ka /pra ma tha na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha nA ga /pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bI ra bI rA shA

ya/ su yan+ta su yan+ta/ ba ra ba ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya/ pra shA sa ya/ gi ri gi ra/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu yu/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya

gA ya/ gAd+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ bi b+hi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hA man+t+ra du ru ti/ kar+N+Na sha ta par si ka b+ha ba bi sa na/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi sa twa bar da swA hA/

de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes

med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing

dngangs par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen pos phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems

dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rab tu na zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams

'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skems par byed do/ /lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do/ /yul 'khor rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do/ /'dre gdon dang / nad dang / sman gyi dug dang /

srin bu'i dug dang / log pa dang / ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yongs su 'dzin

par bgyid dam/ mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang bar langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig klog gam 'don par bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su srung ba bgyid cing yongs su skyob par bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo

rgya chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na smon lam

rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/ rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du

shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/ gang zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur/ gang zag de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag

la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/ btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa'

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/ gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ gang zag de 'jig rten na

mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i gdong dang / mig dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad la rnam par blta ste/ gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na byang chub

sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas/ dri ma dang bral nas sa dang po dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid

par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab 'thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur

lags so/ /gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang / tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/ zas dkar

gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de/ rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ tshes lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems

dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad

yongs su dag par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char

dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam

pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so/ /gtsang po dang / chab mig skams pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis

lan bdun bsngags te sug pas bya bas na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas

nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs

par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te/ mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig

bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/ smon

lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan cig bsreg par byas nas lan brgya rtsa

brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags

so/ /gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te/ chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/ yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/ drod dang / dud pa dang / 'od byung gi bar

du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang byug par bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bdag nyid kyi lus

bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o/ /de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas 'greng ste/ lus

drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o/ /sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/ lag mthil du bzhag la/ mthe'u chung dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe

bong ni yan par brkyang ste/ lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/ phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni lus kun sdud pa'i

phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin du grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gzungs

ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwarA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta/ a bat+ta/ pa ri bat+te/ e hi e hi swA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan

pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par bgyis la/ mthe

bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di'i bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams

cad dus gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang / kun

'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra NI maN+Da la/ e hi e hi/ pra b+hA shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig

stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ slar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ spyi bo thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bo

gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs

pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba brnyes pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma dang mthun lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur

ro/ /de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo dang srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i

tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du mnan te/ lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag par bgyi ste/ 'di ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi

khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa

de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang bgyir mi rung lags so/ /rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba gcig lags na ni/ ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur

lags so/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba tsak+ShuHka rA ya d+hA ra NI in+d+rA ya swA hA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i

lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/ 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so/ /gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swA hA/ de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas ting nge 'dzin rtogs par

'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bsgreng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs

par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'dis ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags ni snga

ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad dang / 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo la reg

par bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por bsgreng nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/ lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/

oM sarba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/ de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/

lag mthil bkan la mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ma hA brah+mA ya e hi e hi swA hA/ phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o/ /

gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/ chab mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o/ /chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sh+lo ka khri lobs par

'gyur lags so/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so/ /de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi

nor bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas snying gar thal mo sbyar te/ mthe bo gnyis ka lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgreng ste snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med

khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par bsgrub pa gang lags pa

des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas/ bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su byang bar

'gyur bas/ de'i slad du yon tan 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lags so/ /de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste

mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen mo ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la bcu gcig pa byang

chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i

tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas

sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ o~M sarba bud+d+ha sa ma ya e hi e hi brah+ma shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mig

stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang rig sngags dang / phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar bgyid pas/ rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te/ bre mo'i gtam rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o/ /gzungs las

byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o/ /yongs su dad pa'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag nas skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar

mi bgyi'o/ /gal te khe la gdu bas slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yang dag pa'i yongs su dang ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags

pa des bsgom par mi bgyid na/ bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par

bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o/ /gal te dbyen tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang / phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag 'byung bar gyur na/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad du ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang / dkon mchog gsum dang yang dag pa'i chos dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 'dre gdon

thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams dang / bi nA ya ka rnams dang / khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par mi mdzad cing rtag

par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /lam sun 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par

gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyis nongs skyon lags pas don de'i

slad du gzungs 'di yi cho ga dang / glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag par bsrung ba dang / byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /

sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/ /chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i sems dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang /

rtsa rgyus dang / rkang dang / mgo dang / mig la sogs pa'ang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/ chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par bsgrub par 'tshal na rin po che dang / 'bru dang / dar zab dang /

gos dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ slob dpon gyi bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du

sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i

brtson 'grus dang / lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing de dag dus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/ /dkyil

'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ ri'am/ chab mig 'bab pa'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/ nye 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad ni shing gi rtsa ba dang / dogs ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te

bsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang / spos chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o/ /de la dbus kyi

gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhi lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang pa

cig bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o/ /

gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan+dan dkar po las bgyis pa zhig gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang par bgyis nas sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba

re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen po bri'o/ /lho nub mtshams kyi stan

la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o/ /nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gsum pa ni zheng du khru do par bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba

'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad du ma bu re re'i nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng

du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang / gri'i phyag rgya dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid

bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / bi nA ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la'ang 'od 'bar

ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi

chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon

shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang

gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa'i gcig dbus su kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam cig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas gzugs

bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dar tshon sna

tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/ /'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sder dang / snod spyad dang / bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang / dngul dang /

khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lags so/ /'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/ /gdan dang me tog

sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/ /'bras sA lu'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par

bgyi'o/ /sngags mkhan de yang 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byugs te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / ga bur la sogs pa bsres te/

gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/ /nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs gzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems

dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs nyi shu rtsa

gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor kyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang / gnyis pa dang gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs

rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu bstan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas

g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad sgrib cing mchod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus

po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i

tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs

dang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang / 'dre gdon thams cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /de ltar smon pa

rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i/ gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni bal ras sam/ btso ras la ri mo bris te bgyis na'ang rung lags so/ /smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor

gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ga ru bsreg ste/ lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/ smon pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te

skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/ lan re zhugs kyi nad du dor ba lan

stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar

'gyur lags so/ /mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba len brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/ /'dre gdon

gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /yul phyogs su

rims nad byung bar gyur na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/ gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi

ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze tsin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po'ang de'i

tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang / 'khrug pa byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i

phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ga ru bsregs te/ rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /

sngon yul bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag cig gnas pa las bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/ lo lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong

ba las khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do/ /de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes

smras nas/ de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang / gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa las/ deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya

thub par 'gyur pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/ khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phul bas cho ga 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/ /sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal te/ phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon

pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde

bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par du

'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas

btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ rgyu dang rkyen des gang zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang

ldan pa'i gzugs 'dri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar po khru bcu drug pa'am/ khru nyi shu pa'ang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gser gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/ gdong la mig gsum mchis pa sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil

du'ang mig re re bri'o/ /sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do/ /sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni glegs

bam thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni 'khar gsil thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni pad+ma kha bye ba thogs so/ /yang

gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/ /yang gcig gis ni bgrang phreng thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni zil dngar

yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so/ /sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis

po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya brkyang ba nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/ ji skad du

byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/ /lag ngar la ni gdub 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan to/ /lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko

ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ /kun tu ru'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/ /gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'dri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu

tsan+dan dkar po'i chab kyis dogs la byugs te/ dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe/ khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/ /chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags

nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa zhig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar gsum dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos chab dang /

me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams mthol bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong

lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/ nyi zla zil gyis mnan te 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/ rnal 'byor

pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma

gtogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas/ bdud

chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs

stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par gyur la/ mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i

nang nas mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba legs so legs so/ /ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par

bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod

pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen

po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/ /'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal

chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar

'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skams par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma

rungs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/ /rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin

par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par

bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gis lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis

btab ste/ g.yar khams bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snying gar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/

yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /

phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang bsrung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyid do/ /phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas/ chab gtsang ma'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/ thal

pa snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis

gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste/ mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na maH/ sarba bud+d+ha

d+harma/ saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si bi si bi/ kA ya si bi/ pa la sha pa la ni swA hA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta bu'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/ /

rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang gdugs kyi gung dang gdugs bas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa

ma mchis pas nam du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan tu 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la

byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang blo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo / /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i

mthe bo lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas dus gcig gi tshe yang

lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes

la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang / ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan

yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar

'gyur lags so/ /gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog pa'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ chab rdzing du bor nas dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos pa'i

me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga

'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog phor

thogs te/ a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di

dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/ /gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar

bgyis la/ gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng

nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong

rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par

bgyi'o/ /'di dag sreg pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis

rig sngags la mchod par bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag sngags 'dis btab nas thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rmi ltas mthong bar

'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ /bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags

'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i nya chos kyi 'dun sar chos ston pa na/ klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar

mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che

mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gcig phul ba dang / bdag gis ni de la yum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan

gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ /bi ma le ma hA bi ma le u ha le/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa hA le/ tsi li te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/

byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig brel

zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang

sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /

sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te/ chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing dge ba'i sems ci'ang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub

sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pas bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa

dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/ nongs pa 'thol bshags te/ phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems

dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyobs pa'i 'khor lo'i

phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang / lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o/ /sor

mo rnams kyi bar yang tsho na gang tsam mchis par bgyis te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su 'das pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur

pas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga char bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag go/ /de'i rjes la sug pa
