dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba gnod pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa 'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa sems can mi khom pa brgyad du ltung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs snying rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongs su gsol/ dgongs su gsol/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ta dza ta/

dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu tu dzu tu/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsi ti

tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes kyi sprin gyi rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ myur du gshegs su gsol/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /

snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi las bzhengs su gsol/ bzhengs su gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e hi/ bu d+ha bu d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol/

bzhengs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma thA ma thA/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ bzhengs su gsol/ bzhengs su

gsol/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma A sa nA ya swA hA/ shwe tA dz+nyA u pa bI ti ya swA hA/ ki ri ta ni swA hA/ shU la ne swA hA/

tsakra ne swA hA/ badzra ne swA hA/ tri ne tre ya pra haM rU pA ya swA hA/ A kA shA ya swA hA/ shi ni shi ni swA hA/ pra tsa ba ta ye swA hA/ ya ma ye swA hA/ ya ma b+hud ya swA hA/ AN+Da dze b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ dza ra yu dze b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM swe da tshe b+h+yo b+hu de b+h+yaHswA hA/ a pa yu pa pa duHkhe b+h+yo b+hu te

b+h+yaHswA hA/ bi ti ka b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ bai d+hi ta ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ Sh+pha Sh+Na ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ sa na ni pa ti ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba bud+d+ho swA hA/ sarba b+h+ya ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+hu me a na ta r-i Shi tsar+ye b+h+yo b+h+yaHswA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tri Ti tri Ti/ tru Tu tru Tu/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /

'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ gra sa gra sa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki to shwa ra Adz+nya pa ya ti swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thugs rje chen po snying

rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yas man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/

gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas

pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston

par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su

'dzin to/ /lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin

kyang thob/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la

sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba

dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig /de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang

cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag

'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha ga me/ tsak+Shu kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+h+rA Na kha be/ dzi hwa kha be/ kA ya kha be/ ma na kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ shU na tra kha be/ a na mi ta kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mA d+hi kha be pA ra/ mi tA kha be/ bo d+hi

kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra d+harma a d+hiSh+ti te/ ka la ka la ka la/ sang+g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na mo dwA na ba ti nAM/ bud+d+ha ko TI nAM/ a d+hiSh+Than+tu man/ tsa ta sra paR+Sha do A yur ba lan tsa da dan+tu/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA

mu ni/ ma ti ma ti ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa mr-i dAn+tu mAn/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+hA ra NI swA hA/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po

de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o/ /so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/ /rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par

bgyi'o/ /klad pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/ /lto na ba la byab bar bgyi'o/ /gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byug go/ /nad

thams cad la byab par bgyi'o/ /'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o/ /ji ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / ldong ros la sogs

pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la tsan+dan dang / a

ga ru dang / kun du ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a

ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti li b+ha na d+hA mi/ mi li b+ha na d+hA mi/ tsi li mi li b+han d+hA mi/ sI mi b+han d+hA mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/

phyogs bcur mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi

li/ tsi le li/ e hi b+ha ga bA na/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag dgug par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dus

gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /'on kyang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser

gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs dang ting

nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa phyogs

bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur

ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang /

lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba

ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni/ /mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod bya ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rgyud chen po/ /

'dod pa'i don kun rab ster ba/ /dang por re zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su hU~M gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes brjod la/ thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par

bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ oM tsit+ta pra ti b+ho d+haM ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/ /zla ba'i steng du hrIH'i sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems

dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar ba/ mchan du ni gos dkar mo de la 'khyud pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la/ 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/ /'dod chags skyon

gyis mi gos shing / /de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon/ /khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o/ /dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs

brgyad du lha mo rnams bsam mo/ /oM bi lo ki ni/ a ba lo ki ni/ a ba lo kA ya swA hA/ shar gyi 'dab ma la ni rnam par gzigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab

ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /o~M b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hU~M/ nub kyi pad+ma la b+hu ri ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /o~M b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tut+ta ma ta hU~M/ byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po

bsnams pa'o/ /o~M ma hA shrI ye ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ 'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /o~M badzra pad+me shwa ra ma ra pad+me hU~M/ lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /o~M bi shwa pad+me hU~M/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma

ste/ nub phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o/ /o~M bi shwa bag tre hU~M/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /o~M hrIHpad+ma naR+te shwa ra hU~M ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan

ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go/ /de ltar gang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub brtan por 'gyur ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ster ro/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing / /gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no/ /

'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing / /so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid/ /rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'phang ni/ /spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar

dang rab sbyar te/ /rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin/ /sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /bcud kyis len ni bde bar yang / /'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing / /tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /

skal bzang ye shes bla na med/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub pa'o/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/ /rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang / /nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob

'gyur zhing / /ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/ /de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje dam tshig de yis ni/ /rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog /'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur/ /o~M hrIHpad+ma narte shwa ra hU~M/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub

mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro/ /yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad kyi mchod pa'i

'os su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang ba dang / g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying

'khrug par byed do/ /stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod

byas na gnod sbyin mo grub par 'gyur ro/ /khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha dang klu dang / mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag sum cu bzlas brjod byas na bsam

pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du

'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas nas gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod

byas na rang dga'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu

'grub par 'gyur zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o/ /o~M paN+Da ri ba si ni ba ri de hU~M/ 'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan cig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do/ /nub bdun gyi nang

rol du rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang

yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /o~M bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swA hA/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na me long dang / mtheb chen dang /

nam mkha' la sogs pa la gsal por pra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang sngon byung ba dang da ltar dang phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do/ /yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags par byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus so shing 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na

dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam na ston par byed do/ /de yang 'khrul pa med par ston no/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod

sbyin gyi bu dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur gum dang / rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsams

la/ chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya'o/ /de yang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o/ /yang na lha dang / klu

dang lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / blon po dang / skyes bu'am gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i snying gar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs

bzhin pa dang / zhags pas ske ba nas bcings la dgug bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur par rab tu gsal por bsam par bya'o/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya'o/ /oM b+hu ri ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hU~M/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang /

rdo rje chu la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la/ de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling ngam gling gzhan dang / grong khyer dang grong dang / yul 'khor gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o/ /de yis bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs

spyod la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /o~M b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hU~M/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/ dug dang / tshwa dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang / dri

chen rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste/ dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o/ /zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sems la sdig pa med par

gyur na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M ma hA shrI ye ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ lha mo 'di la dri dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yul chos kyi rtsod pa

las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/ /yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /o~M badzra pad+me shwa ri ma ra pad+me hU~M/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug

ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/ gtsug phud mdud na rang bsrung zhing rims dang / lkog nad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon dang / me dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang /

'ching ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang / zad byed dang / skyug pa dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / bsgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par byed

do/ /'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do/ /yang na klu thab khung du bris la der dug dang / ske tshe dang tsha ba'i sbyin sreg bya zhing klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag

gcig sbyin sreg byas na char chen po phab nas mu ge med par 'gyur ro/ /o~M bi shwa pad+ma hrIHsna tshogs pad+me 'di ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang mi mthong

bar byed pa dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lcags sgrog gcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do/ /lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi

dngos grub ster ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ /o~M bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro/ /tshig

shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs par byed do/ /rang nyid bsrung ba dang / gzhan yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan po yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do/ /ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems

can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang / dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis bsrung ngo zhes thugs

kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to/ /sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar/ /de ltar 'dir ni

rab sbyar nas/ /de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub/ /ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing / /kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis/ /'dug pa'am ni langs kyang rung / /'chag pa'am ni gang dang de/ /

rgod pa'am ni brjod pa'am/ /gang de ji bzhin don bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang / /rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag /bsod nams chung ba'am 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /thams

cad mkhas pa nyid dang ni/ /thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang / /skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi/ /bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min/ /byang chub sems chen la brtson na/ /rnal 'byor dag ni de lta yin/ /khrag

chen po dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar dang bsres pa ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na/ /kun las mchog gyur bcud len no/ /sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /bcud kyis len ni sla ba ru/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang / /nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob/ /

grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang / /gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub/ /bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /rang nyid so so rjes su 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad de/ bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing smyung bar gnas pa'i lha bzos

tshon sna ma 'dres par ras gsar pa de yang rang rang gi kun tu khru re'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog dmar ba

mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste/ 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ /g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ /g.yon pa dkar ba ste gti mug nyid kyi phyir ro/ /phyag drug pa bya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gcig

gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /sems dpa'i skyil

mo krung gis gnas pa bya'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo/ /pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljang gu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi 'dab

ma la b+hu ri ni ser mo ut+pa la sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can ni pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /shar gyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams

pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog can dkar mo pad+ma dang shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi mtshams su

sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/ sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams mtshams su'o/ /dzaHhU~M baM hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang /

lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o/ /yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na skud pa dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na

pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa'am skyil krung phyed pas

gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po/ /mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas gzung ba bya'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa sa la

gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdan stengs su bzhugs pa'o/ /phyag re re na phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar zhing

dmar ba phyag bcu pa seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /seng ge dang / glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul gyis 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad can no/ /g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa

steng du po ti can te rkun ma dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang / mtsho dang / thog chen po dang / sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no/ /gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sngon bzhin du langs

pa'am/ 'dug pa bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/ spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ljang khu'i rta zhal lo/ /yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag brgya pa'i

bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha bsnams pa'o/ /yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa yang bya'o/ /kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'am/ bzhengs pa yang bya'o/ /tsam pa ka lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so/ /thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa

po me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod dang / bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na gzung ba bya'o/ /de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan du 'od dpag med pa'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni thang sku'i cho ga'o/ /thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas/

mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/ mchod yon snod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas dang / sgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te/ sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba po ni sngags 'di nyid/ /kha

cig la yang mi sbyin no/ /blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i/ /sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya/ /mchod rten las byed nyid la ni/ /blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin par bya/ /rang nyid dang ni nor dag gis/ /bla ma la rtag gus par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la/ /mchog

tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul/ /gang dang gang ni btang dka' ba/ /mchog tu gyur bar 'dir ni bsngags/ /chung ma sring mo dang yang ni/ /bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag /bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya/ /glang chen rta dang shing rta dang / /phyugs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang / /yul 'khor rgyal

srid ldan pa dang / /rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni/ /gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul/ /rdo rje slob dpon dgyes gyur pa/ /thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam b+ha la dang / bod kyi

lots+tsha ba dge slong pa ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pad+ma mu ku Tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun nas 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po

phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ /steng zhal ser ba/ g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/ 'dzum

pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang / /khyad par

cho ga bstan par gyis/ /zhes gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/ sku yi rnam pa 'di lta ste/ /thugs rje dag pas chu shel te/ /mnyam par bzhengs

pas 'gro don mdzad/ /chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar/ /ljang gu'i mdog can nag po che/ /ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar/ /drang srong rtag tu brgyan/ /zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang / /khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes/ /bcu

pa sems dpa'i rtags can de/ /bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag /yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng / /phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa/ /dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te/ /g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin

mdzad pa po/ /g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te/ /g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin/ /g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste/ /lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ cod pan gnyis nas 'od zer rab tu 'phros pa dang / bcom ldan

'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga byung ba 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'o/ /khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che de'i nang du

seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / glang po che de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o/ /yang yum ni sku mdog sngon mo ste/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng / /tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhi mdzes/ /sems dpa'i rgyan du ldan pa yi/ /mnyam pa yi ni skyil

krung bcas/ /yab ni sku mdog ser po ste/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng / /thal sbyar nor bu bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni/ /gzhon nu ut+pal mchog

sbyin mdzad/ /zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog /cung zhig khros pa rdo rje can/ /dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste/ /nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin/ /drag po gnyis dang hrIHyig las/ /gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs/ /ha ya gri ba khams gsum sdud/ /khro

gnyer can gyi phrin las mdzad/ /gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing / /khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms/ /'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dang por dkon mchog rab dad cing / /tshad med bzhi ni rab tu rdzogs/ /byang chub

yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /chos dbyings rang bzhin stong nyid do/ /gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par

gyur to/ /de nas yang gsungs pa/ o~M hU~M trAM hrIHaH/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+sam bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa

ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te/ baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ sngags 'di 'don par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi

bu mos lan cig brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gcan

gzan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /o~M a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA r+NAM/ Ad+ya nud pan+na twAta zhes pas gtor ma'i chus la mchod par bya ste/

o~M AHhU~M zhes pas so/ /de rnams kyi sngags bsdus pa ni/ o~M ma Ni pad+me hU~M zhes pa'o/ /'di ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ de'i phan yon ni 'di'o/ /chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen por mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe

pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M na maHsarba thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ga na d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nai

wi d+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Dal pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab

gnyis ldan pa'i/ /hrIHyig dkar po yang dag bzlas/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ /dang po zhi ba'i las sgrub na/ /yid du 'ong ba'i ljongs dag tu/ /dkar po dang po gsal dus su/ /dri zhim chu yis legs byugs te/ /me

tog dkar po bkram byas nas/ /khrus dang kha zas phyogs mthun pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /bum pa dkar po tsan+dan dkar/ /dris bkang shing gos legs par dkri/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs par bzhag /hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal

gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams/ /zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa/ /hrIHlas 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal ba ni/ /bzlas

ba rab tu gsal ba ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na/ sA gar/ bai ro tsa na/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo

ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mi ta b+ha la che ge mo shan+ti d+ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /bru~M/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chus/ /gang zhig legs par khrus byed pa/ /dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas/ /'bras bu bde ba

de thob 'gyur/ /'jigs pa kun las rab grol te/ /myur du chu skyes thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na/ /nags tshal shin tu mthug po ru/ /dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram/ /rgyan rnams yongs su brtags

nas ni/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas/ /rin chen ga 'ur blugs byas la/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag /hrIHlas byung ba sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma

bsnams/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha he/

samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i steng gzhag ste/ /'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur/ /de nas

dbang gi las byed na/ /sdud par byed pa'i chu klung 'gram/ /pa la sha dang a shwat+tha/ /me tog dmar por ril bu byas/ /bse gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug /me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod/ /hrIHyig las byung sgrol ma ni/ /ljang gu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /phyag

stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na/ sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maH

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha smiM ku ru/ o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+ha smiM ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs nas/ /byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur/ /de nas

phrin las bya 'dod na/ /dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni/ /ba yi lci bas legs byugs nas/ /me tog sngon po ni ma pa yi/ /spos kyi tshom bu lnga byas dgram/ /byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam/ /gcan gzan steng du chu shel

te/ /hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /pags pa 'dzin pa yi/ /drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can/ /phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa/ /g.yon pa pad steng ral gri can/ /

g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung / /rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon pa thod pa dkar po ste/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang / /rgyal po chen po'i rol pa ltar/ /cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /bskal pa bzang po'i

sangs rgyas stong / /pad+ma'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga

tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M a ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ki Ta ka Te/ ka ro Te ka ro Ta/ bIr+ye swA hA/ o~M karma

a mo g+ha/ bi badzra siM ha nA di hU~M phaT/ dri'am byug pa dag la ni/ /btab la lus la byug par bya/ /me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag /maN+Dal chu yis lus la byug /nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas nas ni/ /las rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bzhi ka

sgrub 'dod na/ /bkra shis dus gsum rdzogs dus su/ /ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu/ /sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste/ /maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni/ /dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams dgram/ /gtsang ma bram ze

byas te gzhag /khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng / /chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang / /'dzum dang zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ /ljang gu bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ste/ /nag po khros pa dmar ser skra/ /ser po'i zhal ni 'dzum pa ste/ /

dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu/ /pags pas stod g.yogs shing / /sna tshogs sham thabs mnabs pa yi/ /zhabs gnyis phyag drug mnyam par bzhengs/ /g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar/ /bar ma pad+ma bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /tha ma mchog sbyin spyi

blugs 'dzin/ /bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni/ /la se ma le gI rti ste/ ni rti nang gi lha mo dag /zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA

ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/

tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/ bum pa'i chu la legs bsgrubs nas/ /lus la byugs pas grub par 'gyur/ /cho gas bsgrubs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni/ /gro

ga'am ras sam shing shun la/ /ra yi 'o mas bris pa yi/ /tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la/ /dbus su sku yi sa bon te/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste/ /shar du de yang bri bar bya/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan/ /lho ru de ni yang dag dgod/ /lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i

gsum/ /nub tu de ni yang dag dgod/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /e yis rnam par sbyar bas te/ /byang du de ni yang dag dgod/ /dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te/ /shAn+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o/ /swA hA dbus su dgod par bya/ /de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod

nas/ /dngul lam dkar po'i ga 'ur gzhug /thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur/ /yung ba'i chu yis bris pa yi/ /puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o/ /tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing / /kham phor ser por legs par gzhug /rgyas pa'i las rnams grub

par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yis legs par bris/ /ba shaM ku ru mtshams su dgod/ /kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug /dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /nim pa'i chu yis legs par bri/ /mA ra ya ni mtshams su dgod/ /lcags sam thod par

yang dag gzhug /phrin las thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing / /zhi bas de ni me la bsreg /'bras bu mngar dang bcas pa'i shing / /rgyas pas de ni me la bsreg /dbang ni pa la sha yi shing / /de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur/ /

nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i/ /bsregs pas phrin las 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rim pa ni/ /dUr ba'i rtswa dang 'bras kyi 'dab/ /til dang yungs kar ci tse la/ /gsang sngags bzlas nas grub pa ni/ /da li'i

shing la legs bsregs nas/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar nus/ /ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang / /stag ma'i me tog dmar po la/ /gsang sngags bzlas par rab bya ste/ /tsan+dan shing la legs bsregs nas/ /rgyas par bya ba'i las grub cing / /nus pa mchog

ni thob par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi shing dag dang / /khre dang ci tse mon sran la/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa rab bya ste/ /pad+ma ka yi shing la bsreg /nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni/ /bra bo mon

sran til nag po/ /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas bya ste/ /kha ti ra yi shing la bsreg /nus dang ldan de las rnams ni/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la/ /lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang / /rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas/ /mya ngan

'tshang gi shing la bsreg /nus pa thob nas myur du ni/ /mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud/ /ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / /mu la pa tra'i shing dag la/ /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ /a ru ra yi shing la bsreg /'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa yis/ /

rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi shing dag dang / /ka ra bI ra'i 'bras bu la/ /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te/ /'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas/ /ral gri'i 'og tu bcug nas ni/ /g.yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /tshe rabs brgya ru

lon pa'i rus/ /mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa dag /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ /skyer pa'i me la rab bsregs te/ /lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na/ /glang po dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /ba le ta dang ta le sha/ /kha ti ra da d+ha ti ma/ /

dur khrod shing la legs bsregs nas/ /stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du/ /nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang / /sman dang rin chen sna tshogs kyis/ /maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /pad+ma chu shel las skyes

pa'i/ /chu shel mdog can 'dzum pa can/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs pa/ /ku sha'i stan bcas shar du 'dug /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis/ /byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bya'o/ /nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang / /shu ba g.yan pa me

dpal dang / /nad dang gdon ni thams cad bzlog /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge ba'i/ /'bras bu sdug bsngal nad rnams zlog /me'i las bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rgyal po'i 'jigs pa la/ /maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/ /

tsan+dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te/ /mchod yon me tog dkar po dang / /ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod/ /sdig pa thams cad de mdun du/ /bshags nas myur du skyabs su 'gro/ /gro ga dag gam shing shun la/ /rgyal

po dag gi gzugs byas te/ /yig 'bru lnga po btab pa yis/ /tshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing / /byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la/ /bskur na rgyal po'i chad las thar/ /o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHaHsho na ha ri ma ka to/ /sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ gcan gzan 'jigs pa

'ong ba'i tshe/ /maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/ /me tog dkar po rab tu gtor/ /mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod/ /sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro/ /'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga/ /tshon sna lnga yi phur ma lnga/ /byas pa lus la btags pa na/ /gcan

gzan 'jigs pa thams cad las/ /myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur/ /o~M AHhU~M trA~M hrIHsho sha na ha ri ha tirma ka ro sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ chom rkun dag gi 'jigs pa la/ /me tog sngon po rdo rje can/ /mthing nag sa gnon phyag rgya can/ /mchod gnas bdag nyid

skyabs su 'gro/ /o~M ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra na ga ra kha ti pa swa d+hi tsa kri ta ya ri ka tse tsa tra ti na dur ta na/ sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la/ /bal po se'u'i lcug ma yis/ /bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan bsgoms te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms nas/ /

spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang / /man shel pad+ma rA ga dang / /in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas 'khyil/ /gser dang dngul dang dUr ba dang / /rin chen brgyad dang 'bru snar bcas/ /ku sha gla rtsi tsan+dan dang / /ba lu skyer pa ut+pa la/ /gur gum dri zhim lus la byug /oM rat+na saM b+ha ba sa

ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la/ /stag dang 'brug gi rus pa dang / /'khar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang / /zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang / /gser gyi phye ma gro bar btums/ /snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te/ /byams pas phyogs

mtshams kun tu bstan/ /dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs/ /o~M a mr-i ta ba badzra dz+wa la badzra dz+wa la/ /gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni/ /'brug rus sen ta wa sha dang / /til dang sA lu ci tse dang / /nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum

gyi/ /thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste/ /me yi phyogs su gtor bar bya/ /o~M bai ro tsa na pra b+hA dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms te/ /me la gtor nas sa yis gsod/ /chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la/ /mdze can pho mo'i thod

par ni/ /ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag /sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas/ /nang du bcug ste chu bor dor/ /don yod grub pa'i sku ru bsgom/ /o~M a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ o~M ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA/ phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /thugs rje chen

po'i sku mchog ni/ /so sor gsal zhing bsgom par bya/ /so so'i dbu la so sor bsam/ /byams pas kun la rab tu lta/ /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa kun las yongs su bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //sku gdung me tog dkar

pos mchod/ /sa gzhi dri yis chag chag gdab/ /snying po gzugs dang bcas pa 'am/ /khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la/ /legs par mchod cing bstod par bya/ /stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar/ /rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ /

byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste/ /rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni/ /khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan/ /lha yi rol mo char du 'bab/ /chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter/ /rin chen lnga yi bdag

nyid de/ /phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che/ /de yi bsod nams bstan pa ni/ /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams/ /skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag

ni/ /byams dang snying rje can gyis bya/ /bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /'dri mkhan snying rje can gyis bya/ /rang bsam lhag par gnas pa yis/ /mdun du bdar te mchod pa bya/ /tshad dang kha dog yongs dag gsal/ /yid du 'ong ba dag la'o/ /zas dag

yid du 'ong ba'am/ /dkar gsum 'bags pa spangs pa yis/ /sha dang sgog pa la phug dang / /zwa dang chang ni shin tu spang / /shel phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang / /bo d+hi tse dang mu tig shis/ /glal dang sbrid pa mi tshig rnams/ /nam yang chod par mi bya'o/ /

yo byad dang dam tshig la brten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed na/ /po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la/ /brten nas bdag nyid byams sems ldan/ /mu~M las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni/ /dmar ser po ti ut+pal 'dzin/ /mnyam pa'i

skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /bum pa kha dog ser po'i nang / /rin chen lnga dang 'bru lngar bcas/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi te dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/ lan

bdun yongs su bzlas byas na/ /gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur/ /ras ris mchod rten la brten nas/ /maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dgram/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum dag tu ni/ /'bras dang til dang yungs kar dang / /pad+ma'i rtsa

ba dkar po la/ /ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i sku mdog dkar/ /phyag na pad+ma mchog sbyin mdzad/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa

le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste/ /byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas bza'/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas/ /rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal sngon po

legs nas/ /ut+pal sngo dang nim pa dang / /a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang / /dri yi chu yis bum pa dgang / /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can/ /sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro/ /de ni rdo rje phyag na bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/ hU~M skyes phyag na rdo rje yis/ /bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas na/ /zhe sdang rab tu zhi byas nas/ /bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /

dug rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //ras sam gro ga'am shing shun la/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa'o/ /srung ba lus la btags byas na/ /nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni/ /

'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar/ /bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skud pa dag ni dkar po la/ /mdud pa dag ni rab byas te/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du legs bzlas nas/ /bsrung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na/ /bsrung ba yi

ni dam pa 'dis/ /bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o/ /mu tig byi ru rin chen gser/ /ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang / /a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /phur ma snying gar gdags par bya/ /tsan+dan gla rtsi gur gum dang / /gu gul nag po rus pa'i phye/ /ba yi 'o mas lde gu

byas/ /gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni/ /gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun la/ /byugs pas de ni bsrung bar 'gyur/ /bsrung ba 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //ser ba yongs su bsrung ba ni/ /seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la/ /gzungs

sngags bzlas nas dbus su ni/ /hU~M las byung ba'i sku bskyed do/ /phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni/ /shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni/ /sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /o~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ lho ru gshin

rje gshed po ni/ /dmar nag rin chen be con 'dzin/ /o~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni/ /me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin/ /o~M ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ byang phyogs khro gnyer can gyi sku/ /ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ /

o~M a mo g+ha kab+h+r-i ku Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ phyogs bzhi'i phur bu dag la ni/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres/ /gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/

ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer byung ba 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'gro

ba ris drug po de dag la khyab ste/ dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa

mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang /

gya nom snang dang / 'og min la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku/ /phyag stong nyon mongs sgrol ba'i phyag /spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te/ /'gro don mdzad

la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to/ /de nas lha yi bus gsol pa/ 'di yi phan yon ci yin zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig

rgyud 'di yid byed na/ /nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni/ /rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang / /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mtshams med mi dge'i sdig pa kun/ /rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba ngan

song sdug bsngal dang / /mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te/ /nyan dang 'chang dang bsgom par 'gyur/ /dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu'i/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud nas legs so legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ siM ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug du bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la

bzhugs so/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lam rnams ji ltar sbyang / e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ /

de yis smon lam sbyang ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yid la byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug langs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA

satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro kaM Te/ bI r+yai swA hA/ o~M AHhrIHsiM ha nA da hU~M/ bru~M A~M dzrIM kha~M hU~M/ o~M AHhU~M/ o~M ba li na b+huny+dza dzi ba puSh+pe d+hU pe hU~M/ sarba a mr-i te hU~M/ o~M ba ta li/ ma hA ba ta li/ hU~M

hU~M hU~M dzaHswA hA/ o~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzaM hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M a ta pra ti hU~M phaT/ sri ti ka ra hU~M phaT/ o~M ba ru Na A gats+tsha ya/ Agats+tsha ya/ ma hA nA ga gi sa ti sarbe b+hur phuHphuHphuHswA hA/ o~M b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smr-i ti sa ma ba ti/ sa ra ma ti sid+d+hi swA hA/ o~M

AHhrIHhU~M swA hA/ phuHhrIHo~M siM ha nA da hU~M phaT phaT/ nA ga du pa la mA ra ya phaT/ dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/ o~M a big+h+nan+ta kr-i ta hU~M/ o~M ag+na ye a ti bya/ a b+hi sa ma ya bi sha/ ma hA shri ye ha bya/ ka bya ma hA ni ya swA yA/ o~M b+ha ba ka ag+na ye/ shAn+tiM ku ru ya swA hA/ AHhrIHsiM ha nA da badzra tsakra brta

lo ki ka bru~M bru~M bru~M/ lo kot+ta ra Ni siM ha nA da bru~M bru~M bru~M hU~M na hU~M na/ siM ha nA da bru~M bru~M bru~M hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'o/ /gsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las yin te/ nang par ba'i lci bas lam

lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ /seng ge'i steng du zla ba la/ /rgyal po rol ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /g.yas na thod mtshan rtse gsum la/ /drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang

du bsdus/ /pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni/ /'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da/ /shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas/ /dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la/ /rigs lngas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang / /rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan/ /seng ge'i

cha las byung ba yin/ /'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis/ /pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan/ /rang lus 'og nas thal mo sbyor/ /sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed/ /rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i/ /thugs ka nas ni sngags 'od 'don/ /spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags/ /

nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya'o/ /gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no/ /gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tha na 'di la mos

pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / tshangs pa'i bu dang / tshangs chen rnams kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed de/ de bas ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

bu la mas srung ba bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyi bar du gcad par mi nus so/ /gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur

ro/ /'dir ni mdo tsam smos su zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang / klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis bsrung bar gyis shig

ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byas so/ /de nas gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge sgra'i rgyud

ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pradz+nyA kA ra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sid+ha nA da na ma d+hA ra NI/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i

rtse mo na/ rin po che'i khang rin po che dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu

med pa dang / nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dug

ste/ 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yul

ma ga d+hA na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang btsun mo dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po de mdze dang / phol mig dang / dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid la 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba

yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po cig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal

thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po las rgal ba'i dus su seng ge bzhag nas khur res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog

gi bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/ tri shU la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/ seng ge dkar po la zhon/ mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs

kyis sems can don byas pas/ /rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/ /lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las/ /grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gums par bgyid/ /ces smras te/ lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i

dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te thod pa bkang ngo / /de nas bar snang gi lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin

dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/ tri shU la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ /rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/ /sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i

las/ /grong khyer 'joms zhing sde brgyad 'gums par bgyid/ /ces smras te/ sde brgyad la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags

ris dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phul lo/ /de nas sa'i 'og na

gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ /rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/ /klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las/ /grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid/ /ces smras te/ rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las

dkrugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus te/ dga' ba'i

mdangs phyung nas klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal/ bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig /nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/ /

ces smras nas tri shU la la lan gsum dkris kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur phuHphuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas so/ /klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/ /

khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o/ /klu rnams thams cad skyabs su zung / /nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/ /ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la 'khris so/ /klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid do/ /ci bka'

stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o/ /snying nad sel ba zhes bya ba'o/ /'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po de 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge khyod nyid yin no/ /

de'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no/ /'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /yid la zung shig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma

Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa dwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te ka ro Te/ tsi ti dz+wa la ka ro ti bI ra ye swA hA/ gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la/ da lta rang nyid kyis brjod pa'o/ /'di'i

cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sku lugs ma'am bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog tshom bu lnga lnga bkram ste/ me tog dang /

bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ maN+Dal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/ lci ba lhag ma la bsngags shing nad pa la byugs na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang klu la sogs

pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/ 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no/ /'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go/ /'jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i

gnod pa ni gzungs 'dis snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal nyon cig /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M AHhrIHsiM ha nA da hUM phaT/

da lta nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa nyam ngar 'gro mi 'gyur/ /lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs shing / /klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu

dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bud med lus su mi 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /shi nas bde ba can du 'gro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub

dang / 'od srung gis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da lta shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ha ya grI bA ya/ na mo lo ki shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M hrIHku lu yu lu nI la kad+Tha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hA hA

hA hA/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hrIHhU~M phaT/ 'jam dpal gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma ha ya grI ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur/ /klu sogs

gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no/ /bye ba grangs med mthu las byung / /de yi yon tan dpag tu med/ /lan cig bklags na sdig pa sel/ /lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan/ /

gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur/ /'bum phrag bcu yis zhal mthong 'gyur/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro/ /'jam dpal mi gzhan dag la ni/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / /rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang / /klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang / /klu bram ze'i

rigs kyis zin pa dang / klu gdol pa dang da rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lto rgyab tu na ba dang / klad kor du na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / zha grum gyis btab pa dang / sbrum pa lta

bur na ba dang / srog chags su na ba dang / tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang / za khu can dang / lud pa glo can dang / rus khol du na ba dang / 'phres pa dang / zha ba dang / yig mi bde ba dang / thor pa lta bu'i nad dang / skran can dang / dmu chu can dang / 'bras dang /

me dpal dang / lhog pa dang / gag pa dang / chu thig can dang / grang lhang lhang dang / tsha tsag tsag la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang / phol mig dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / bdud dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / brag srin dang / sems 'khrug gi

gdon dang / thab gzhob dang / mtsho sman dang / klu la sogs pas zin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang / nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de yang mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig /snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di/ /dang po thugs rje chen po la/ /gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /snum pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya/ /lci ba drir bcas byugs nas ni/ /tshon

rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bu bri/ /bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang / /phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag /gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams/ /seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod/ /dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod/ /tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo/ /A hrIHhri pa~M rta~M no~M/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags

'di ni/ brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel swA hA/ sangs rgyas mchod la brtson par bya/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la/ /tshon

skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams bsreg /rma bya rmag shad lcug ma yis/ /klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed/ /hrIHnA ga le le/ nA ga dum ba le le/ nA ga phuta phuta ha le ha le/ hA la hA la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ nA ga khrol khrol shig shig swA hA/ klu dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi dug dang / mthong ba'i dug dang /

bcings pa'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / reg pa'i dug dang / dug thams cad phyir phud cig swA hA/ dug 'dir ma 'dug cig /sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig /'dzin pa'i gan du song shig /me'i nang du song shig /chu'i nang du song shig zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni

de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /hriHbru~M oM hU~M kha~M/ rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /bkra shis lha mo dpal dang ldan/ /bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas/ /dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas/ /bum chu dag pas las sgrib

sel/ /lus ngag sems kyi dag pa thob/ /pha rol phyin drug gnas 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/ /skud pa dkar po sum sgril la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad byas nas/ /mgul du

btags na nad las grol/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na/ /nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /chu la gzungs sngags mang bzlas na/ /klu nad khong du sel bar 'gyur/ /lo tog za ba kha bcings na/ /bye ma

sa dang thal bas sel/ /ha cang char pa ches pa na/ /lha la phul ba'i rnying pa la/ /kham phor sar pa'i nang du yang / /me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni/ /bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/ /thal chen yungs kar bzlas brjod kyis/ /

ser ba nya lcibs lcug ma dang / /lcum po btags te btsugs gyur na/ /ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin/ /lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i/ /gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/ /sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la/ /bzlas

brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /slob ma gos zas dkar por sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug /bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya/ /nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/ /klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis/ /glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs

pa las/ /gi wang gis ni srung 'khor bri/ /yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags/ /bus pa gdon dang nad las thar/ /lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/ /thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwar/ /bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud pa bor/ /song na bde zhing don yang 'grub/ /

rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la/ /chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/ /bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur/ /mi nad phyugs nad thams cad la/ /yungs kar dang ni bum pa'i chus/ /bkru zhing btags na mi nad zhi/ /a mra ri yi gzungs sel ltar/ /las

rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/ 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na 'di yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa

yin pas 'dis dbyung bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po pad+ma la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po dungaskyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M ba ru NA ya swA hA/ o~M a nan+ta ya

swA hA/ o~M bA su kA ya swA hA/ o~M tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/ o~M kar ko TA ya swA hA/ o~M pad+mA ya swA hA/ o~M ma hA pad+mA ya swA hA/ o~M shar+kha pA lA ya swA hA/ o~M ku li kA ya swA hA/ klu yi gzugs ni mang po yang / /dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la/ /legs byas kha dog

bsgyur byas la/ /me tog spos dang byug pa dang / /mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog phreng / /tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya/ /rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang / /me tog 'bras bu sman gyis mchod/ /rma bya gzungs mo me long gis/ /rgyal

po khong gi dug thon cig /rin chen rmag shad mchod pa'i rten/ /mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs/ /bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes/ /srog chags yid 'ong gzugs kyis mchod/ /zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis/ /zin kyang skad cig

gcig la thon/ /'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o/ /stobs so byin gyis brlabs so/ /thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi lang yang bdag gis cha shas tsam zhig brjod na/ o~M bcom ldan

'das/ bya ba byas shing byed pa byas/ /khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/ /srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad/ /yang dag bka' las rnam par grol/ /sems dpa' dbang bsgyur thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa/ /srid las rgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /

AHgzhan la phan brtson thugs rje can/ /sems can kun la mchog tu byams/ /khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu/ /mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas/ /hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob/ /dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin/ /mngon shes

drug brnyes n+ya gro bu/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes/ /sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra/ /gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshon/ /sku tshad che la 'od zer 'bar/ /rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phro/ /

dbu skra thor tshugs gyen la brdzes/ /dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ /klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu dkris/ /rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin/ /dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma bsnams/ /

shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar/ /nyon mongs dag pa bram ze'i mgo/ /me tog dri zhim tshogs kyis bkang / /klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas/ /sbrul gyi tshangs skud mdzes la bstod/ /siM ha/ pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs/ /bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad pa/ /

seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ba spu nyag ma re re yang / /sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod/ /tA/ dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/ /

lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang / /'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ljang / /gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ut+pal thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed/ /hU~M/ gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed/ /yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor/ /'dod

pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi/ /'jigs pa brgyad po sel ba bstod/ /phaT/ ha ya grI ba khro bo'i sku/ /'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms/ /kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa 'dul/ /klu bdud 'dul mdzad hU~M gis bstod/ nA /nam mkha' klu rgyal pa ru Na/ /chu lha ston

pa'i zhal mthong zhing / /bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul/ /sa dang po yi bden pa mthong / /bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/ /klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ o~M ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka taM ka ra swA hA/ gang gis bstod

cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong gi bar dung na song du mi skye'o/ /bud med lus su mi skye'o/ /

su zhig nang par langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te/ gtsang sbra la gnas nas/ thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/ 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog tu 'jug gam kha ton tu bton nas snying po dang gzungs sngags zlos na ni de'i lus la mdze

dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang / bas ldags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang / gag pa dang / spos pa dang / dmu chu dang / skem pa dang / mkhal ma rdol ba dang / don snod 'dus pa dang / byad kyi dkyil 'khor la
