sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /

skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/ s+yAd

ya the da na/ ha ha/ hi hi/ hu hu/ sa ra sa ra/ la hU~M la hU~M/ shIg+h+raM/ ma hA bi d+yA/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skr-i te/ ha sa ha sa kiM tiSh+Tha si/ kiM kiM tiSh+Tha si/ ka na ka bi tsi tra/ A ba ra Na bi b+hU Shi tAM ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu

ru b+hu ru/ sarba ar+tha na me sA d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ar+tha na sA d+ha ya/ ar+tha na de hi me/ sarba sa twA nA na sid+d+hi na/ hA hA/ pad+me/ pad+me/ ma hA pad+me/ bi Sha de/ bi Sha de/ ma hA bi Sha de/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/ ta ma haM g+ho re/ tan me

bi d+yA ma pra yo dza nA ya/ sid d+hiM ku ru/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang

phyug chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bskum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa

yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo rad pa dkar po 'tshal

ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / me tog phreng dang / zla gam dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa

dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rad pa

dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lag na rdo rje la me tog

dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chan sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me

sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing / re re nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o/ /de nas zla ba nya'i tshes lnga'i

gdugs la yang cho ga 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor ba dag dang / bdug spos dang / ga pur dang / pog dkar po dang / tsan+dan dang / shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas

bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /

gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/ /des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser

sna yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o/ /mchod rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis

kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gal te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su gyur pa gang

lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la yang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so/ /sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras shing dam bca'

ba yang byas pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod nus par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das

la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin

gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyi zhing re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyis/

de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/ tad+ya thA/ o~M shang khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ tiShA d+ha ne/ d+ha na dza ye/ bri bri/ bri d+hi ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri ti ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/ be sha bsta/ A yu d+ha d+hA ri Ni/ yu

yu A yuSh+pA la ne/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sma ra bo d+hi tsi ta taM/ mA bi lam ba/ de hi me ba ran/ shaM khi ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na/ de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs

spyod 'phel ba dang / dbang phyug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba yang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa phyogs gtsang ma'am lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang /

pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang / nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so/ /yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras

so/ /sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ dbyig dang /

nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong

ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

gis de bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'khrug klong dag las rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub

par bgyi/ de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/ sarba bo d+hi satwA nA na/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ badzra pA Ni pra b+h+r-i tI nA na/

tad+ya thA/ o~M ma hA de bi/ b+hi me b+hI ma ma te/ dza ye dza yA ba he ya sho ba ti/ ya sho dza be/ te dza dza be/ byA ka ra Na prA pa te/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki te/ kri pa te dza pa hu le/ ta thA ga te a nu dz+nyA tam pA la ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ de hi me ba ran/

sid d+hiM ku ru/ de bi ma hA de bi sat+ya ba tsan de bi b+hi ma sat+ya ba tsan pra tiSh+Thi te gu h+ya ni bA si ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi

'di dag smras lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/ ci dang ci 'tshal

ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ /gang la la bdag rang gis gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar

po sar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba'i tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa

bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan

thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang / bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/ tshes brgyad nas tshes lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas

pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher

bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa

brgyad bgyi zhing re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/ dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter

lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / bu mchis par bgyi ba dang / nor 'du

bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma

gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na yang bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo legs so legs so/ /sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /

sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig /de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo

legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchid ton du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par

'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ ma dgongs pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /

yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser

dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid

mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing / lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul dag las yongs

su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal

ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar ba kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag gi phyir dbyig yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me tog gcig gam/ 'bras bu gcig gam/ ba dan nam/ rol mo'i sgra'am/ spos sam/ gos sam/ rgyan gcig tsam

zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis de bzhin

gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/ rjed par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis

bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa dang / skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par

byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin

gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa yang de lta ma yin no/ /de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen

po dang / blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du

'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par

'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang / bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i

mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang

dag par bshad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon

po chen po dang / blon po snod du gyur pa mchod pa byed pa/ 'dzin par byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang dang / shar dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na/ yang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad

par mi byed pa dang / yid ches par mi byed pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / bu smad dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / bro dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing /

phrag dog dang / ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi

bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar ba kho nar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las

yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bstan par bya yid la yang gzung bar bya'o/ /khrag khrug dang / 'khrug klong dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dag dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba

dang / gnag nad dang / phyugs nad dang / mi nad dag dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs dag la yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o/ /rgyal mtshan btsugs la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis

mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/ der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su

bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing / /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni zung shig kun dga' bo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ /gang gis

khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/ /mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni/ /sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi phod do/ /gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dad byas te/ /tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur/ /

gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'thor byed cing / /gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/ /bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kA ra ShA pa Na'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing / /byang chub phyir

ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la/ /ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du/ /bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na/ /de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod 'gyur/ /de ltas phan yon 'di dag

thos nas kyang / /sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te/ /mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/ /bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya/ /rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing / /sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la/ /sems dmyal rnams su skye

ba na/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re/ /'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la/ /yang dang yang du sngam pa 'don byed cing / /bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su su 'gyur zhes/ /byis pa'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing / /sangs

rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrogs pa/ /mi bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing / /phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med/ /bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med/ /yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med/ /nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/ /

kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad/ /ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas/ /de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur bas/ /sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na/ /byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed/ /de phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal

pos khor zug dang / /mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing / /'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ ston pa'i 'du

shes kyis bcad bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/

rgyas par mi byed kyang / des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid

la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ /'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can

thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri len ba med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang /

'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/ /slad ma'i

dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang / bro dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes

pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas yongs su zin cing / mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba ches par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal ba 'di yid byung bar

bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas

yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/ /de lta lags pas na lus dang / ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi

zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la yang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags

so/ /de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag dang / a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra dag dang /

lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs

chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo

de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang /

'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa

de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi

bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i

dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po

dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang

zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug

bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po

dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu

chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang /

chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug

bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen

po mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug

bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs

pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje

dang ro gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can

thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed

bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / /de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/ /de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing / /ngag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed

bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/ /thugs

rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma

Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra brti/ tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so/ /oM pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/ snying po'o/ /oM b+ta ra ta pad+me hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ma Ni badzre Ni hU~M/ /

bsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka nA ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra d+hA ra NI a nu shaM sa sa hi ta sU trAta sa~M gra hi ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo po Ta la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

gnas na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nga la 'di lta bu'i gzungs yod ming ni thugs rje chen po zhes zer

sems can kun gyi mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa bdud dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje

chen po'i sgo nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab bo/ /myur bar bshad du gsol/ nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong

ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mos 'don pa dang 'chang bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas thog mar 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis chos

rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje

chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog /

spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du 'dus ma

byas kyi khyim phyin shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog /bdag ni ral gri'i ri 'dzeg na/ /ral gri'i ri ni rang snyil shog /bdag ni chu tshan 'phrad gyur na/ /chu tshan me mur rang zhir shog /sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/ /sems

can dmyal ba rang skams shog /bdag ni gnas song na/ /bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog /bdag ni lha min gnas song na/ /ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog /bdag ni dud 'gro gnas song na/ /rang nyid shes rab che thob shog /de skad du smon lam btab nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming

nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing / de nas gzungs 'di lan cig gam lan bdun gyi bar du bton na/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur

lags so/ /gal te thugs rje chen po 'di 'don cing 'chang na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing

yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad med pa ji snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ci ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na thugs

rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus las yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don

cing yongs su gzung bas gal te bud med kyi lus las yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /the tsom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi za bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de skad

ces smras nas 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te/ drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gya nom pa 'di dag smras so/ /snying po ni/ o~M

ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ gzungs ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dra uts+tsho sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka ra ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tra NA ya/

tas+ya na ma skr-itwA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ta ba nI la kaN+Da nA ma hr-i da yaM/ A brta yiSh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na/ shu b+ha tse ta na/ sarba satwA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha ka /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he kA ru Ni kA sma ra hr-i

da yaM/ e h+ye hi/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka /ku ru ku ru/ karmaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAM de hi de hi me/ a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ du hu du hu/ bIr yan+te/ ma hA bI ra yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la a ma la/ mAR+ti Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rakr-iSh+Na

a dzi na/ dza TA ma ku Ta/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a laM ba/ pra laM ba/ bi laM ba/ ma hA sid+d+ha/ shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA ma la ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kriSh+Na pA sha /nir+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka ra ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/

e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha nI shwa ra nA rA ya Na pa la rU pa pe Sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ he ma hA ha lA ha ra/ bi Sha ni ra dzI ta lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha nA sha na/ ni ra mo k+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu lu mu hu lu/ hA la hA la/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru

su ru/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ta/ sid+ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA aT+TAT+Ta ha sa nir nA di ni/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha wa tsaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yAM sma ra sma ra twAM/ he b+ha ga bAn/ lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/ ta thA

ga tA dA dA hi me dar+sha naM/ pra sA d+ha yA mi swA hA/ sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sid+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra

ha stA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra pa kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la mu ku Te d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra u yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shaM khe shab+da nir nA da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma skan+d+ha de shas+thi ta kr-iSh+Na a dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma ha ste byA g+h+ra tsar ma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke

shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga wa te Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis

gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du/ gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/ /stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan

gtum po dang / /rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang / /gzungs 'di 'don pa thos nas gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/ /gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang / /gnod sbyin srin po nya dang ru sbal dag /gzungs 'di thos

nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba'am/ /chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang / /

lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rgyal po brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig byad stems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te/ /zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs

bzlas na/ /dug ni zil dngar zas skom nyid du 'gyur/ /bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/ /bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i

dbugs btang bas/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang / /shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen

po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi/ /sems can rnyog pa mi dge spyod pas na/ /byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /byad stems gdon de gtong ba'i mi

la 'dud/ /sdig 'phel snyigs ma dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ /'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas/ /khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/ /nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/ /gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /

'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/ /bdag gis gzungs 'di mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/ /bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yid mi 'gyur/ /gal te thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas

pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dang de dag gi lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na sdig pa'i las dang / kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/ zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas mngal dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i

lus len par mi 'gyur na/ kha ton du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te gang zag de'i lus dang / spu dang skra dang / gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i phyogs su song ba'i sems can

gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de

dag gis thos pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las btus pa rdzogs so// //dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA kalpa ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi kur+b+ba Na pa Ta la bi sa rAd b+ha ga ba tA Ar+ya tA rA mU la kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byam las

bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo

mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig /byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye

bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de legs par nyon la

legs par yid la gyis shig /ngas bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so/ /de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par so sor thob par byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha

rgya gar skad du/ Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA ka lA ma hA bo d+hi sat+wa bi kur+b+ba Na pa Ta la bi sa rA da b+ha ga ba tA A r+ya tA rA mU la kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byams las

bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo

mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i co 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ phrul gyu khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye

bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par bye pa'i rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi/ seems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de legs par nyon la

legs par yid la gyis shig / ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so// de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dis skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par so sor thob par byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa/ nyna tsho dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha

dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig sngags dang / gsang

sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad don med par gsung bar byed pa ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang /

bdag cag dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar bzung nas de gsung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag

pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i

'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i

'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su zhugs te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon

lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal

ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun du skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig /de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzums pa spyan gdangs nas/ 'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon

par phyogs te gnas so/ /de nas kun du skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun du snang bas kun du snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to/ /de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal

te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dgongs su gsol bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der

song ste bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog

pa dang / gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang / bzlas pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba

chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ reg par gnas sam zhes rmed par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal to/ /

sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang / gsang

ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ras ris kyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/ rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byam

'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa/ mthar thug par zin pa dang / nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang / dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang / 'jig

rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang / spyod pa

mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang / 'di la rjes su yi rang ba kho na'o/ /sems dpa' chen po/ da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig /shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs

'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'di la yang rtsa ba'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA

ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai Ar+ya tA rA yai/ bo d+hi satwA yai/ tad+ya thA/ tA re r-i dzu ka d+harma ni t+ya te/ tA re tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te/ tA re a na b+hi lA pya/ d+harma nir+ya te/ tut+tA re/ tu re tu re hi ni/ tra sa ni tra sa ni/ o ha ni/ mo ha

ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ pra b+he/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi li hi li/ tsi li tsi li/ b+he ga sA mi ni/ kuN+Di kuN+Di ma hA kuN+Da/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha na pa ni tA re/ hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a haM yA ya/ tsin+ta yA mi tsin+ta d+ha mi ku ru swA d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di ni sems

dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing / gsung bar 'gyur ba ste/ khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par

phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/ shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o/ /'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'di la nye ba'i snying po yang /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bod+hi satwA nAM/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa byang chub kyi snying po

kun du thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun du gang bar gyur to/ /rgyal ba'i sras po legs so legs so/ /gang khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de rnams kyis thabs cig byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed ma/

rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang mthun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /

thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun du gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs par gyur to/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/ oM gIH

'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa las rkyong

ba'am/ brkyang pa las skum pa dang se go la gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzums pa skad cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du 'khod nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun du snang bas kun du snang bar byas nas

rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che

du mas rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang / lha'i gos dang / dar gyi rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che

g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa/ sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa/ mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das shAkya

thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo / /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byed do/ /lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa

mthong nas skrag cing / snying 'dar te 'on te 'byor pa yongs su nyams sam ci zhes phan tshun thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar rtsom zhing / 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig /shAkya thub pa yongs su

skyobs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to/ /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs

pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de/ don chen po spyod pa dang / rig sngags kyi tshig dang / chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

bstod do/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la/ /don med thams cad bzlog pa po/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng ge khyod/ /ngan song thams

cad 'joms pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsod nams dri ni mtha' yas pa/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod/ /srid gsum 'dam ni rnam sbyong ba/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol

byed/ /thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed/ /zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po/ /thams cad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa/ /bkra

shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni/ /yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

khyod phyag 'tshal/ /shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun/ /legs par byas shing yang dag thos/ /theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la/ /rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu

smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char

kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur ba der/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar

gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa ni/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/

don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad cing de 'di ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzad do/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi

spyod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam dang / skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongs su

mthar gtugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang / nye ba 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bcom ldan 'das la

gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo / /gang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan

'das shAkya thub pa'i sku de yang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal ba

med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par 'jug par byed gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god par mdzad pa ni

ngo mtshar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes par 'dod pa'am/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang / sems pa shes par 'dod pa'am/ mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa bsdus pa dang / so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid du blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong

ba dang / ring por mi thogs par spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa 'am/ yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/ bdag gis ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta bzhin du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du

nye bar tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka dang / ku ta ra dang / bi ta ras bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangs su grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin rlabs sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad don yang dag par thob par byed pa dang / rig sngags dang /

gsang sngags kyi tshig thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rtog pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

byed pa dang / sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang / shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang / rgyal srid dang / zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba mdor bsdus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/ rkang pa rab tu brgyus pa/ yid gzhungs par byed

pa/ 'chugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu rab tu 'jug par byed pa/ mngon par spyod par byed pa/ don thams cad thob pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / ci bgyi dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad

'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / lang tsho ji ltar gnas bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/ mdor bsdus na las thams cad byed pa/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyas pa can dang / zhi ba can gyi las rab tu byed pa/

ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhin pa/ de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog pa chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam ngas rjes su gnang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis

gsungs pa/ dag pa'i sems can rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don/ chos kyi mdzod/ skye bo mang po la phan pa'i ched dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du/ lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la ston cig /de

nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun tu skul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu

dag pa'i sems can du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyis shin tu

gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor nub par gyur to/ /'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi dkyil

'khor yang dag par bskul bas bsgrubs pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun du gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba'i

dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa'i

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sgrol ma'i gru'i tshal na

gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston pa'i tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam

gsungs pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams su/ phyogs bral rnams su zhes pas/ steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams

cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su thams cad du yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa nyan thos kyi

dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid lta bar 'dod pa/ mchog gi rig pa'i rjes su spyod pa sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad

par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor 'khod par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ lag bzang dang / rin chen bzang po dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / spyan

bzang po dang / dga' ba bzang po dang / chos gos bzang po dang / dngos grub 'char bzang dang / thams cad 'phags dang / chos 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang / lhun po'i dpal dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

dpal dang / 'od byed dpal dang / rab snang dpal dang / snang ba'i dpal dang / don thams cad kyi dpal dang / lag na thams cad rin chen dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / lag na rin chen dang / lag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam

par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / ye shes snying po dang / don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying po dang / chos 'phags snying po dang / mchod sbyin tog dang / tog bzang po dang / mtha' yas tog dang / 'od zer tog dang / dri med

tog dang / ma lus tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin chen tog dang / 'brug sgra dbyangs dang / rnga bo che'i nga ro'i rgyal po dang / mtha' yas gsal ba'i ye shes rgyal po dang / mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang /

rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po dang / phul du byung ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i rgyal po

dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / thams cad gsal ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med par yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / phyogs lhag pa'i rgyal po dang / rang

gi dngos po med par snang ba dang / bsod nams snang ba dang / kun du lta ba'i snang ba dang / 'od dpag med dang / dpag yod snang ba dang / spyan bzang snang ba dang / legs 'byung snang ba dang / mtha' yas snang ba dang / mi tshugs snang ba

dang / ma sgyur ba dang / 'og min dang / dri med dang / me dang / snang ba dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khyud kyi tog dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / lha'i lha dang / lte ba rgyas pa dang / 'jig

rten zhi ba dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / rnga bo che dang / grub pa dang / dkar por grags pa dang / lha rab tu bzod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang / gsal dka' ba dang / ring du song ba dang / ring por len dang / ring por gnas dang / mtho zhing

mtho ba'i mun pa dang / mkha' snang dang / kun nas snang dang / snang min dang / khyu mchog dang / kun nas snang ldan dang / nges par mnyam pa dang / lha chen po dang / shin tu nges pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dri ma mthar thug pa dang / mnyam

pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang / dkar po dang / i mi ki mi dang / tha chung dang / dka' bas 'tsho ba dang / bde bar 'tsho ba dang / legs par skyes pa dang / du ba'i tog dang / mchod sbyin tog dang / dkar po'i tog dang / tog bzang po dang /

dbyig gi tog dang / nor dgag tu med pa dang / pha chen po dang / do shal phyed pa dang / 'jig rten grags pa dang / kun du grags pa dang / chen por grags pa dang / mchog tu grags pa dang / skyes pa dang / snang ba dang / ci bgyi dang /

mnyam par byed pa dang / 'jig rten byed pa dang / snang ba byed pa dang / nyin mor byed pa dang / 'byung bar byed pa dang / don thams cad byed pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / kun du gsal bar byed pa dang / rnga bo che'i dbyangs

dang / sgra dbyangs dang / dbyangs bzang dang / mtha' yas dbyangs dang / tog gi dbyangs dang / 'byung ba'i thub pa dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / 'od srung dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang /

rnam par gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mang po rnams kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po kun du snang bar byas nas pad+ma'i gdan la so sor bzhugs par gyur to/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i

tshogs de rnams kyang bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ phyag na rin chen dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / phyag na bzang po dang / nam mkha'i phyag dang / mtha' yas phyag dang / sa'i phyag dang / snang ba'i phyag dang / shin tu dri med dang / bzang po brtsegs

pa dang / mang po brtsegs pa dang / nor bu brtsegs pa dang / rin chen brtsegs pa dang / e na brtsegs pa dang / rin chen glang po dang / kun nas glang po dang / spos kyi glang po dang / bzang 'gro dang / dri ma dang bral bar 'gro ba dang / 'jig

rten 'gro ba dang / mdzes par 'gro ba dang / mtha' yas 'gro ba dang / mtha' yas grags pa dang / legs grags dang / dri ma dang bral bar grags pa dang / 'gro bar grags pa dang / dri med grags pa dang / grags pa'i mgon po dang / mgon

med kyi mgon por gyur pa dang / 'jig rten mgon po dang / kun nas mgon po dang / rgyun bshes kyi bu dang / mtha' yas bshes kyi bu dang / kun du bshes kyi bu dang / byams ma'i bu dang / mig bzang gi bu dang / phyag 'tshal bshes kyi

bu dang / twa Sha tra'i bu dang / 'bras bshes kyi bu dang / rin chen bshes kyi bu dang / skyabs gsum bshes kyi bu dang / theg gsum bshes kyi bu dang / mthu bsgyings dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / yid 'ong ldan dang / chos kyi dbang phyug

dang / dngos po med pa'i dbang phyug dang / kun nas dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / legs gzigs dbang phyug dang / rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa dang /

mchod pa bzang po dang / 'brug sgra'i dbang phyug dang / rnga bo che'i dbang phyug dang / bkod pa'i dbang phyug dang / bi Sha te swa ra dang / char bzang po dang / mchod pa bzang po dang / grags ldan dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rab tu skyes pa la gnas pa

dang / zla ba'i dbang phyug dang / so ba'i zla ba dang / zla ba nyid dang / mtha' yas dpal dang / kun du dpal dang / 'jig rten dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i kun sdud dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sa'i dbang phyug

dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po dang / bzang skyong dang / nor bzang dang / legs par kun sdud dang / lo thog kun 'gyed pa'i nam mkha'

dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / don kun rtogs pa dang / thams cad 'byung ba dang / ldog bya min pa dang / mi ldog pa dang / ngan song bzod dang / rnam par sgyur med dang / bkra shis rnam 'grel dang / gnad thams cad srung ba zhes

bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyod yul du sgrol ma'i gru la bzhugs par gyur to/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i don mtha' yas pa sgrub pa sems can mtha' yas pa dag gi bsam pa rnam par 'jug par byed pa'i lam la rab tu gnas su 'jug pa'i bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig

sngags kyi gzhi rjes su 'dzin par byed pa sman gyi cha byad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams dang / 'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nor bu dang / sngags dang rin po che'i rgyal po dang / sems

can dang / sems can ma yin pa grangs med pa thams cad kun du 'jug cing sems can gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang / bsam pa ji lta bas sems can 'dul ba de lta bu'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang / de dag so so'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su

'jug pa rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos nges par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la kun du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi rim pa las 'da' bar

mi bya bar tshig gi lam la rab tu gnas par byed cing / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gdugs dkar mngon par 'phags pa dang / lo ma mtha' yas dang / lo ma

brgya pa dang / gtsug tor rgyal ba dang / mngon par 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / gser gyi 'od zer dang / 'od zer dkar po dang / gtsug tor bkod pa dang / gser gyi phung po dang / dkar po'i phung po dang / gzi

brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / 'byung ba'i phung po dang / bden pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i phung po dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po ste/ 'di rnams dang /

gzhan yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yongs su skong bar byed pa/ skye bo thams cad kyi yid kyi bsam pa rtogs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

phrag gis kyang mi nus pa'i gtsug tor rgyal po nam mkha'i mthar thug pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa'i bdag nyid chen po lta bur ston par 'dod pas mtha' dag rgyas par bshad pa las mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/ rig

pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'dus pa bshad par bya ba 'di lta ste/ mdzod spu dang / smin ma dang / spyan dang / rdzi ma dang / snyan dang / mgrin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / brtse ba'i tshim pa dang / shes rab dang /

'od zer dang / sems dpa' dang / 'od zer dri ma med dang / chos gos te 'di rnams dang / gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas spros pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang /
