bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni/ /phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru/ /de nas slar yang gnas de ru/ /srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis/ /dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te/ /gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyis/ /rked pa man chad dril phyis bya/ /kun du

g.yas pa slar byin nas/ /lag pas yis bkru bar bya/ /sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang / /gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du/ /bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas/ /ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi/ /ba yi lci ba ser po dag /gtsang zhing dri med snod blang la/ /srog chags med pa'i chus

sbyar te/ /dang por ston pa thub pa yi/ /mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /khyad par khru gang tsam du 'o/ /gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/ /gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la/ /gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po/ /slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin/ /bzhi

pa sems can thams cad kyi/ /nye bar longs spyod don du grags/ /g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o/ /gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /

gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/ /dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni/ /kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o/ /khru gang ngam ni khru phyed rung / /nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o/ /zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs/ /sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin/ /de nas

sngags pa thub pa langs/ /lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/ /dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni/ /'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blang / /mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu'am/ /

chu mig chu bo la gnas pa/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/ /sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus/ /sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya/ /gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang / /de nas kha la reg bya zhing / /de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun/ /

mig dang sna yi bu ga dang / /spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya/ /dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni/ /bsod snyoms snod ni blangs nas su/ /chu

yi nang du 'gro bar bya/ /gang du chu bo rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang / /chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs/ /mi yi 'jig rten rjes gzung rgyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya/ /de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos/ /brtson 'grus

chen pos 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas/ /sngon ni de tshe sa stengs der/ /sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir/ /'byung po rnams la legs don du/ /sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten

kun/ /dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba/ /mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams/ /'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin/ /'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid/ /slar yang kun du bsten pa rnams/ /'byung po kun gyi zas don du/ /gsang sngags 'di

ni mchog tu gsungs/ /nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi/ /byang sems la bsten thams cad dang / /nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis/ /nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing / /bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang / /gang yang sems

can skom pa dang / /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi don dang / /'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis/ /'od srung 'od ni chen po la/ /thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs/ /nyon mongs rnams ni yid mgu nas/ /khyab bdag de la gsol ba

'debs/ /chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/ /chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol/ /dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams la rjes brtser mdzod/ /de skad gsol nas thub pa yis/ /sngags mchog rgyas par

gsung bar byed/ /ka la ping ka sgra dbyangs dang / /rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra/ /tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang / /tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis/ /gang yang cung zad 'dir 'ongs pa/ /rkang med pa dang rkang dang / /rkang gnyis pa dang

rkang bzhi pa/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /mdor na sems can don kun du/ /bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /sems can la sogs 'dir lhags pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /

'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M ga ga ne/ ga ga na/ gany+dzo A na ya/ sarba la hu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A kar+Sha Ne/ mA bi lam+ba/ ya the pi taM saM pA dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan

'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir nam mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis

yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blang bar bkru bar bya/ /

slar yang de nas langs nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro/ /gang su sngon ni yang dag bsten/ /gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/ /song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru/ /lhung bzed de ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas myur du nye reg bya/ /de bzhin

slar yang lhung bzed blang / /lhung bzed sa la lo ma 'am/ /dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang / /zangs sam shing shun dag kyang rung / /ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul/ /ston la lha bshos phul nas ni/ /slar yang rig sngags rgyal la'o/ /'gron

po gcig ni 'ongs gyur dang / /sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin/ /bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du/ /kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid/ /ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya/ /sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya/ /kun nas rig pa ldan par bya/ /lto ba'i tshad tsam

bzhag nas ni/ /gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o/ /bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis/ /sngags don sgrub par mi nus te/ /ha cang nyung dang mang zos na/ /sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so/ /de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis gnas so zhes/ /

lus can kun la gsungs pa yin/ /gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci/ /srin po sha za dang / /'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni/ /gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa/ /de ni 'ga' yang yod

ma yin/ /rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni/ /kham gyi zas zhes grags pa'o/ /sems can phra mo'i zas can spang / /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni/ /bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni/ /gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste/ /gzugs med nyid kyi lha

rnams kyang / /ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o/ /srid pa bar ma'i sems can yang / /dri za bar ni rab tu grags/ /de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams/ /zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za/ /'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi/ /kham gyi zas ni za bar byed/ /

de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/ /chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin/ /gang de rnams ni rab tu grags/ /zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni/ /zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya/ /gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni/ /zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas/ /

kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang / /dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / /zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la/ /de yis dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur/ /shing rta yun ring gnas don du/ /shing rta'i mig ni sku bar byed/ /de

bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas/ /zas ni gnas pa'i ched du spyad/ /lus ni gso ba'i don du ni/ /zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya/ /sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i don phyir dang / /byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir/ /zas thams cad dang / /ji ltar mngon par/

sred pa'i bza' ba de/ de rnams su char 'bab par gyur to/ /ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa rnams kyis btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba yang

yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim

pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs

su bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang / khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsungs

pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo / /dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spro na ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya/ /de nas dkar gsum bza' ba'am/ 'o ma btung

ba'o/ /ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng

ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyis me sbar nas u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am/ /dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung

gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya/ langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o/ /

de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun du snang bar byed bzhin pa/ sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig /

grub pa yin no/ /zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab

tu ster bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun du sbyin par byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtse mo'am/ mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /der bdag nyid dam/ grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /de nas

sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog /zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu

rtsa gcig tu/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying po'am nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du'am yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong

bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang ba'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang / longs

spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam/ rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do/ /gang blangs kyang rung ste/ de mthun par gnang bar

byed cing / grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo/ /sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa'am/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad do/ /las kyi nyes pa rab tu spags pa yang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do/ /zhes bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/ /las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni/ /dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/ gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ chu klung ngam/ chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal

nub tu phyogs par gzhag la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs bas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ rgyas par gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dong ka'i me

tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa'am gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do/ /ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do/ /ras ris kun nas

'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do/ /ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do/ /ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid do/ /ras ris

kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang / stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil

ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyis yo byad kyi rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan

tan nges par sgrub par byed de/ rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do/ /sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang / /cho ga bshad pa la sems pa/ /sngags pa de tshe

de phyogs su/ /gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni/ /zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang / /dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te/ /sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro/ /mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni/ /brtul

zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin/ /dud 'gro rnams la mthun byin nas/ /'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed/ /lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/ /sgum med zas dang dri bral gang / /lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs/ /gang du slong ba'i snod du ni/ /

de ru zan ni mi bza' ste/ /der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang / /rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya/ /pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te/ /ut+pa la las byung bas sam/ /dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste/ /sngags pas der ni mi bza'o/ /gang

yang sngags pas ku mu da/ /sla k+Sha u dum bA ra las byung / /pa Ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni/ /tsher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung / /a mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min/ /de bzhin sA Ta la las byung / /sA la'i 'dab ma shi ri Sha/ /byang chub shing las byung ba dang / /

gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/ /shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya/ /shing de yi ni yal ga dang / /nA ga ge sar shing la'ang min/ /gang du nam yang bza' mi bya/ /mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang / /thub pa'i lo ma'i

spyil po ni/ /rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /zas ni lo ma de rnams las/ /gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'/ /sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang / /de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung / /shel dang

rdo ba las byung ba/ /de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni/ /rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'/ /lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste/ /de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min/ /stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang / /rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang / /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso/ /lo ma gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung / /zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya/ /yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom/ /sna tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang / /de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams/ /sngags pas 'bad pas

blang bar bya/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog /dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi/ /lha bshos thams cad nyid kyang ni/ /zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya/ /chung ngu tsam yang lus can la/ /sngags rnams

de yis mi 'grub ste/ /kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang / /rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos/ /rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can/ /lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa/ /de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub/ /gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan/ /snying rje

snying rje'i las can dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba/ /rig sngags kun du sgrub par byed/ /sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas/ /zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya/ /gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i/ /zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /rang

la byin pas kha zas ni/ /cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya/ /sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni/ /de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas/ /zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni/ /bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /thub pa

rnams kyis legs par bsngags/ /sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la/ /mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed/ /sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed/ /de nas zlos pos nye reg

bya/ /de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du/ /lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas/ /'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir/ /de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis/ /lus kun nye reg byas nas su/ /thub pas sngags

'di brjod par bya/ /na maH sarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra hi ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kilbi Sha/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/ sngags 'dis bslab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na

sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byugs nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o/ /ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig la'o/ /de nas

ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'phags ma zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pas bcu pa

dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/ /nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o/ /de nas yongs su zhi nas

ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas/ srog chags med pa'i chu blangs te lan bdun mngon par

bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo/ /gang zhe na/ na maH sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ya hU~M/ na dI ba ra d+ha ri Ne/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba

dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcing ba la yang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams

cad yongs su 'chags pa dang / bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad byed do/ /pad+ma'i

gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ /las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i

chus khrus byas te/ thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang / yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o/ /chu'i nang du mchil ma dang /

bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtse bar yang mi bya'o/ /snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye

bar 'gags pa dang / tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung

ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin

tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa'am/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o/ /dang por re zhig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa pad+ma chen po'i lo mas

nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang / rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o/ /

de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o/ /de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog tu snang ba kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab

pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs

ba/ rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grwa na 'khod de/ lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o/ /g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

brgyad la/ 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun du bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / nor bzang zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di

rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/ tsan+dan dang / spos ngad ldan dang / tog dang / tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud brgyad do/ /de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste 'phags pa

maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi lin da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srung chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar

dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de

bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba

chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+hA nu skA ri ka dang / par+Shi ka dang in+t+ra ba ra'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang

sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de bzhin

du gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang

phyogs thams cad kyang kun du snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o/ /sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo/ /nges par byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams/ /

'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang / /sngags pa rnams la phan don dang / /de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso/ /sngags pa kun la phan don du/ /sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so/ /de nas

thub mchog bdun pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya/ /thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang / /gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/ /dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste/ /bar ma la ni de

bzhin gzhan/ /chung ngu la ni phran tshegs 'grub/ /thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs/ /de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni/ /thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste/ /thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o/ /de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni/ /

bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya/ /bsam gtan de la rab gnas na/ /sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni/ /sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs

su gsol/ /chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni/ /de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/ /gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par/ /cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar/ /de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/ /rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/ /der ni sngags

kyis gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ /grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas/ /dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes/ /cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis/ /gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas/ /rang sngags

sngags kyis mgon po dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod/ /de nas gsang sngags zlos pa pos/ /stan de las ni slar langs nas/ /thag ring gnas su song nas ni/ /phyi rol rlung

gi rnam par spangs/ /snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor/ /bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no/ /nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing / /mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o/ /sngags zlos pos ni nam yang der/ /don rnams bsam par mi bya'o/ /der ni rang las byed gsungs

pa'i/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o/ /rab sngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi/ /de tshe sa stengs nyer 'dug ste/ /dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/ /sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis/ /'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas/ /rab tu

'dzag pa bdun blangs nas/ /bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste/ /gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag /mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni/ /snabs la'ang gnyis de de bzhin no/ /de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya/ /gnas la ring du song ba'i sar/ /de bzhin sgra tsam

song nas ni/ /lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru/ /de nas gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin/ /lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu/ /chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang / /de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang / /chu klung spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs/ /'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par/ /

gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang / /bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang / /rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas/ /sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya/ /zlos po dus ni shes byas nas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/ /de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste/ /bas mthar de

bzhin bshang ba dang / /gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni/ /de ru lus ni ci bde bar/ /gnyis ka'ang gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang / /skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin kho nar thams cad du/ /ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang / /bas

mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba/ /de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi/ /gdug pa'i sems can rnam bral bar/ /gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul/ /skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/ /ma dang pha la gus pa dang / /gnyis

skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru/ /lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gnas der yin gyis gzhan du min/ /nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ /ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa/ /sin d+hu na ra ma da bak+She/ /zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram/ /kA be rI dang

dbyangs can nyid/ /chu klung chen po shI ta nyid/ /'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par/ /stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad/ /stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i zhing / /byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang / /kha che dang ni rgya yul dang / /bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang / /

rgya nag che dang li yul nyid/ /de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing / /byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi/ /gang yang ri dang chu bo dang / /bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod/ /nas dang gro ni za ba'o/ /gang du sems can snying rje ldan/ /de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur/ /dpal

gyi ri bo brag ri che/ /lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/ /sa stengs rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'dzin/ /der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /myur du las dang las rnams so/ /rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che/ /chos

kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang / /gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs/ /der yang dngos grub blta bar bya/ /lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni/ /sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang / /lum+bi'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der/ /gsang sngags

rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri der dang / /de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal/ /me tog zhes bya'i grong mchog dang / /de bzhin rtag tu kA sha'i grong / /bcom brlag ka n+ya kub dzi dang / /sa stengs

grong ni 'phags rgyal dang / /mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can/ /rtag tu sa stengs mi thi la/ /grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams/ /gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung / /rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu/ /de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub/ /'di rnams

las gzhan yul rnams ni/ /grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang / /gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/ /'o ma'am 'bab chu la brten pa/ /der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur/ /gnas ni bla gab med pa dang / /rtag tu khang pa

stong pa ru/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o/ /sngags rnams rjes mthun las rnams ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/ /sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya/ /bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson/ /sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms/ /tshul khrims

spyod cing shin tu brtan/ /'byung po kun la phan par dga'/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas/ /gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can/ /kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang / /der ni bskal pa chen por gnas/ /dam tshig snang ba

bral ba'i phyir/ /dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru/ /byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed/ /dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang / /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang / /ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am/ /rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/ /mi

bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing / /log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin/ /dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang / /log par lta ba smad pa yin/ /de phyir rtag tu dad gyur nas/ /gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten/ /bden par smra zhing chos shes pa/ /

sems can rnams la rtag tu phan/ /sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed/ /de yi dngos grub nges par 'gyur/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis/ /las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed/ /rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis/ /bya ba'i

las dang yang dag ldan/ /de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur/ /bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir/ /las ni rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /bya ba'i don du bya min gang / /bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi/ /bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya/ /bya ba las dang 'bras

bu nyid/ /bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o/ /'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing / /'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras/ /'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/ /thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas/ /rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste/ /yang dag sbyor dang bral

ba yang / /bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub po/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni/ /de la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang / /grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa/ /sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu/ /byed par 'dod

pa de las te/ /'dod pa'i las ni byang bar 'gyur/ /las min las ni thams cad la/ /las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i/ /las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya/ /brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi/ /las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o/ /

bya ba ma brtsams sngags rnams ni/ /lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi/ /thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa/ /gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom/ /sgrub po sngags ni kun

shes shing / /rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig /sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/ /lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa/ /sngags kun nyid ni sgrub par byed/ /rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni ring por mi thogs par/ /mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba

yin/ /'byung po thams cad zhi don du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags/ /gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/ /de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/ /chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen

ni/ /dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob/ /sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa/ /sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams/ /'di rnams mdor

bsdus thob pa yin/ /dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa/ /rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin/ /gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa/ /dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang / /de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso/ /tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te/ /lha min lha yi 'jig rten

gyi/ /de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni/ /sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan/ /tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'/ /sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin/ /de nas

sngags pas sngags bzlas bya/ /sngags pa 'byor ba 'dod pa yis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te/ /de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang / /tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/ /tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin/ /bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid/ /mchog nyid

kyis ni ldang ba nyid/ /zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed/ /sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing / /ji srid dus su brtag par bya/ /bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na/ /der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin/ /de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed/ /de la rtag tu

bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do/ /sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas pa de/ de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas/ slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa

zad pa'i don dang / las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mchog dang / bar ma dang tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed cing / skye ba brgyud pa rnams su gang bar byas/ sdig pa de thams cad 'jig

par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas/ lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po

nyid dang / rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab

'byam ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub

sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga /rgyud thams cad

kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la/ legs par yid la zung shig bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka'

stsal du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o nyon cig /gang

gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na/ dang po re zhig /sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud+hA nAM/ a tsin+t+ya d+d+hU ta/ rU pi nAM/ a tsin+t+yad+d+hu ta/ rU pi nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M ku ru ku ru sarba aR+tha sA d+hA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta

bi mo ha ni/ ga ga nA ba laM be/ bi sho d+hA ya swA hA/ rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o/ /sbyang ba dang / dbugs pa dang / blang ba dang / rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni/ lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du/ /de yis

mngon par bsngags byas nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya/ /mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas/ /der ni rmi lam brtag par bya/ /mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa/ /mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs/ /sngags pa la ni des smras pa/ /

bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin long / /sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni/ /shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed/ /mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che/ /rmi lam du yang ma mthong na/ /sngags pas shing de bor bar bya/ /de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis/ /dang po ru drAk+Sha

yin te/ /de las gzhan pa dbang po'i shing / /bo de tse ni 'dod pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi/ /shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i/ /grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya/ /grogs po med par gyur na ni/ /rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya/ /steng

gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/ /'dzegs nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can/ /de la rtag tu bag yod pas/ /steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs/ /steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya/ /steng gi mchog gi dngos grub tu/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /

bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste/ /tha ma la ni 'og ma'o/ /srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i/ /'bras bu de rnams yang dag blang / /nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/ /rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya/ /byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs/ /lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs

par byed/ /dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni/ /kun gyi don du zhi phyir ro/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang / /mi'am ci dang srin po rnams/ /'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni/ /ma lus spyod

pa byed pa'o/ /shar gyi phyogs su yal ga dang / /der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams/ /de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na/ /tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu/ /rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi/ /yal

ga lo mar rab ldan pa/ /sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang / /lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la/ /'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod/ /phyogs der gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi/ /srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi/ /bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/ /

de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spangs/ /'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas/ /'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ /lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi/ /sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro/ /de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni/ /blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa/ /'og tu 'gro

ba'i 'khri shing la/ /de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro/ /de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i/ /bde nyid zlos pos der 'gyur ro/ /lha min bu mos yang dag ldan/ /de ni bskal par gnas par byed/ /bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas/ /de nas zlos pos bzlas pa

bya/ /lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni/ /de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/ /de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni/ /de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya/ /bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya/ /brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang / /de nas kun tu yang

dag sbyang / /der ni phreng ba dbugs par grags/ /gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya/ /rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni/ /brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa/ /de nas de ni dag par 'dod/ /

pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas/ /bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yi/ /sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu/ /'bras bu phra mo zlum por bcas/ /rtag tu srogs chags bu ga med/ /yan lag

ma nyams ma smad pa/ /mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang / /bu ga med cing gas pa med/ /ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa/ /de bzhin ru drAk+Sha dang ni/ /bo de tse dang in+t+ra k+Sha/ /'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes/ /'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe/ /sngags pa mchog

tu brtson pa yis/ /'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya/ /gser ram yang na dngul dag gam/ /nor bu shel las byung ba dang / /mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra/ /byi ru yis kyang bya ba ste/ /phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i/ /bgrang phreng bzang

po bya ba dang / /sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi/ /ril bus bgrang phreng can dag ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste srad bu brgyu/ /gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam/ /'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis/ /ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang / /zlos pos 'bad de bya ba

yin/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga/ /lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin/ /sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya/ /stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba/ phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin/ /phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya/ /

de nas brgyus te sngags rnams ni/ /phyi mo gsum mam gnyis nyid dang / /rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang / /de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang / /de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang / /phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya/ /de nas mtha' ru yang mig bya/ /de la rim gyis dgod

par bya/ /'bad pas mdzes par dkri ba bya/ /sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni/ /yongs su gsal bar byas de nas/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin/ /sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin/ /yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin/ /mu tig do shal rnams

mtshungs shing / /mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o/ /de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar/ /dri ma med la khrus byas nas/ /ji bzhin khrus byas te/ /chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya/ /de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya/ /bgrang phreng srad bu blangs nas ni/ /ba yi rnam lngas

rab tu bkru/ /sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas/ /gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis/ /rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang / /rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang / /tsan+dan dkar po gur gum dang / /'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya/ /de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ji lta'i

gnas su song nas ni/ /gang du ras ris bar pa ni/ /rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du/ /sa stengs rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/ /mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod/ /de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni/ /de

tshe de yi spyan snga ru/ /dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad/ /son pa'am brgya yang gcig tu ni/ /brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas/ /nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas/ /bdun pa'i thub la phreng ba dbul/ /snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba/ /tshad nyid de dang

mnyam par bya/ /de nas phreng la yongs su bzlas/ /mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de/ /ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la/ /sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/ /rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba/ /dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni/ /rmi lam nges par bstan pa

yin/ /dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams/ /gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub/ /nges par de yi cho ga bya/ /dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi/ /gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong / /

gal te rmi lam de mthong na/ /phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du/ /sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po/ /de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa

ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las

gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshogs gsang chen ni/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga le/ hi rak+Sha di hi da dA dI pA ya hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni

mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o/ /dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas/ mar gyi sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te/ zhi ba

can dang / rgyas pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan med shing zhi don du/ /khyad par brlan dang bcas pa nyid/ /mtho gang 'am ni khru gang tsam/ /sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi/ /snam pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes/ /

cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin/ /bu ga med cing ser ga med/ /de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra/ /ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/ /kha dog nag po spang bar bya/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang / /bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin/ /gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa/ /tha ma'i

chos kyang spangs pa'o/ /de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin/ /de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya/ /ma rul yon po min nyid dang / /shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya/ /de nas me thab byas nas ni/ /kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru/ /'og nyid du ni 'bad pas brko/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad dang

ni/ /khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa/ /rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang / /bye mas leg par sbyar ba de/ /de nas pad 'dra'i kha khyer ni/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o/ /yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa/ /'dab ma gsum du

bya ba'o/ /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ /'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin/ /mngon spyod la ni sa dbus su/ /rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su/ /rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin/ /me thab rgya la khru gnyis re/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar/ /chu klung 'gram du de bzhin

spyad/ /bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang / /dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru/ /sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya/ /de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang / /rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang / /de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che/ /gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni/ /gang

zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang / /sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la/ /de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin/ /khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi/ /ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas/ /der ni sngags shes khyad par du/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bya'o/ /gnas de nyid

du rab gnas pas/ /myur du dngos grub the tshom med/ /shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas/ /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya/ /lho ru drag po'i lam rnams te/ /de ni sngags pas spang bar bya/ /shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste/ /rgyas pa can yang byang du

phyogs/ /de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu/ /rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /bil ba arga slak+Sha dang / /n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya/ /mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang / /tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams/ /de dag thams cad spang bya ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /

zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ /rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis/ /de bzhin drag las la shing skam/ /tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams/ /yam shing de rnams med na ni/ /shing la de rnams su rtag bya/ /rtse mo gnyis su brtag pa bya/ /sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang / /rma bya'i

mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i/ /rnam pa de lta'i ku sha yis/ /kho ra yug tu ku sha ni/ /rtag tu dgram par bya ba ni/ /zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/ /mar gad dang ni mtshungs pas so/ /de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rtsis/ /sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste/ /'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis

bkag /dri med chu ni dag pa la/ /rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi/ /de nas kun nas bsang gtor bya/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/ /brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/ /gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis/ /sgron me tshad dang ldan byas nas/ /de

nas khu tshur brtsams byas nas/ /'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya/ /kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/ /rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/ /sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang / /gos gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi/ /rlung gi nye bar gzhom pa la/ /mngon par dga' bas ma yin no/ /

gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos/ /nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya/ /rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis/ /me ni mnyam par byas pa la/ /sngags shes pas ni me sbar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg don du mnyam gzhag pas/ /de nas g.yas pa min pa yis/ /der ni bsang gtor byas

nas ni/ /der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/ /sreg blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang / /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la/ /de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o/ /de tshe me yi snying po yi/ /sngags ni lan brgya bzlas pa yis/ /brtson

ldan dri zhim me tog gis/ /rtag tu me ni spyan drang bya/ /sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/ /gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas/ /sngags des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min/ /zho dang mar du bsres pa dang / /sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni/ /de las lan

gsum sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis/ /'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya/ /skom pa tshim par bsam par bya/ /zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa can/ /de la gsang sngags rig pa yis/ /lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o/ /

mngon spyod las la thun mong pa'i/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lha rnams las/ /gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya/ /rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang / /mar la lan bdun yongs bzlas pas/ /de tshe spyan drang rnam pa der/ /ji ltar slar

yang spyan drangs pa/ /lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas/ /yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam bstan pa/ /de bzhin du ni zho bsres pas/ /stong ngam 'bum gyi tshad dang ni/ /brgya dang brgyad du'ang rtag par bya/ /de bzhin

sngags pas rig pa bzung / /lan re bzlas shing me la dor/ /'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba dang / /de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa/ /zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /du ba med la'ang rgyas pa can/ /du bcas drag po'i las rnams ni/ /rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin/ /me

ni kha dog ldan gyur na/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar/ /zhi ba can la kha dog dkar/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags/ /gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed/ /de la sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar/ /rgyas pa can gyis dngos

grub 'dod/ /nag po du ba'i kha dog dang / /ser skya yang ni sdig pa can/ /kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas/ /dngos grub rnam gsum 'di dag yin/ /gzhan pa'i kha dog sprin mdog gam/ /slar yang brtan pa'i sa stengs der/ /sngags pa de la

dngos grub med/ /de lta'i kha dog 'dra ba'am/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can/ /me ni 'bar ba de mthong na/ /slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya/ /phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /gal te sngags ni grub gyur na/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /slar yang sbyin sreg

la rab 'jug /gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid la ni/ /me yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang / /dkyil 'khor 'di ni gshegs su gsol/ /spyan drang ba yi las rnams ni/ /de nyid du ni las rnams kyang / /de nyid kyis ni bya ba yin/ /me yi spyod pa de

bzhin gzugs/ /ras ris kyi ni spyan sngar brtsam/ /der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur bar/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams ni/ /thams cad de nyid du bya'o/ /gzhan pa'i las ni bya ba ste/ /sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du/ /

gang du rgyal mchog gis smod dang / /'jig rten 'gal dang smad rnams so/ /ldang dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / /de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni/ /'jig rten lha nyid ldan pa 'grub/ /rtag tu ras ris la brtson shes/ /sbyin

sreg las la mkhas pa ni/ /sa yi 'og gi bdag po'am/ /yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur/ /sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid/ /rtag tu gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs/ /rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni/ /yul dang yang na grong nyid dam/ /rig pa 'dzin dang lha

min nyid/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid che/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni yang dag brten/ /sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/ /sa stengs mi

rnams smos ci dgos/ /sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du/ /khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / /'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed/ /de bzhin nyid du mi bdag nyid/ /'byung po thams cad dbang don dang / /yang na sa stengs rgyal po mnyam/ /de bzhin rtag tu las

kun la/ /thams cad sbyin sreg gis ni bya/ /kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas/ /las kun yang dag bsten par bya/ /de ched nges par bsgrub par bya/ /dpal don las ni mchog yin te/ /bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed/ /yang na chung ngu nyid kyang ngo / /de bzhin du

ni rdzas rnams kun/ /de bzhin slar yang 'grub par gsungs/ /sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub mthong / /phyag rgya bcing dang rig pa nyid/ /las rnams kun la rtag tu bya/ /sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/ /bdag nyid

srung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas sngags 'di bklag par bya/ /'di ni rtag tu las rnams la/ /bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M dz+wA la tiSh+tha hU~M/ ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/ /

sngags kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni/ /slar yang shing la bzlas bya ba/ /gnyis bzlas pa'am bdun bzlas pa/ /sngags rig des mer sbyin sreg bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri dag gam/ /mdor na thams cad nyid kyang ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chu rnams kyis/ /'di

nyid kyis ni bsang gtor bya/ /de nas las rnams thams cad ni/ /rgyu 'dis cho ga brtsam par bya/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /snga ma'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya/ /sngar gyi skra can ma bcings nas/ /phyag rgya chen mor grags ldan ma/ /bsrung ba byas par

gyur de nas/ /zlos pos rig pa gcig gis ni/ /las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya/ /dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis/ /gal te dge mtshan mthong gyur pa/ /rtag tu dge ba'i sgra grags na/ /de la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog

stsol 'gyur/ /dang po las la rab sbyor dang / /sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug pas/ /'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/ /dngos grub de la brjod par bya/ /rgyal ba'i sgra 'am pa Ta ha/ /rnga bo che yi sgra grags na/ /brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub ste/ /

sbyin sreg las la yang dag brten/ /gzhan yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni/ /'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dbyangs sam/ /rgyal bas bsngags shing rab bsngags pa/ /bkra shis bzang po yid 'ong dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dang ni/ /gdugs

dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang / /mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu/ /kha dog rnam pa du ma dang / /rab sngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i/ /dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma/ /mthong nas de rnams blta ba la/ /

gsang sngags spyod tshul sna tshogs 'grub/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa

yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod

kyi rig pa'i gsang chen yod do/ /sngags thams cad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dam tshig shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/ chos kyi sprin la mthun par rab tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das

pa'i sngags kyi mnga' bdag ches gtso bor gyur pa sems dpa' chen po dper na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo/ /ches gtso bor gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang nas skyes bu'i khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'

de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing / gtso bo dam pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mchog

gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod cing rab tu bsngags la/ sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ re ba thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/ /bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ /gang 'di/ phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang

ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun du snang zhing sems can thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i lus can blta

bar mi nus pa'i sems can kun gang gis kyang mi thub pa/ 'od chen po yang dag par byung ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa

zhes bya bar gyur to/ /byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil kun du snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas mdun du bdar nas mchod bzhin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma/ rig

pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' sgyur bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la bzhugs pa rnams kyi rim gro byed bzhin pa'i blo gros chen po/ nam mkha'i dkyil

thams cad kyi lha'i rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i don du byas pas thams cad bkang ste/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'od gsal ba/ sprul pa po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'byin bzhin pa/ yi

ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don bzhin pa/ 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'phro bzhin pa bar snang gi phyogs su gnas par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nye bar phyogs nas lta bar byed bzhin pa/ de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la kun

tu lta zhing snang bar byed bzhin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/ /na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ b+h+ru~M bka' stsal pa tsam nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du rnam par 'gyur ba

drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /sems can gang la la bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyes pa med par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang sdig pa

thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir dang / rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad yang dag par srung ba'i phyir dang / dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / bsam gyis mi

khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba kun du bstan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa'

chen po gang la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na de'i don gyi phyir cho ga 'dir 'gyur ro/ /dang po re zhig ma brtags pa dang / mi smra ba dang / mi za bar brjod pa'i mthu dang / sngags kyis 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pas 'byung po thams cad la rab tu brtse bas gzhan

sdug na bdag sdug par legs par mthong bar byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dbang po rnams legs par bzung ste rnam par g.yeng ba dang bcas pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna lag pa la 'jug pa/ rab tu dgag pa'i don du rdzas yongs su 'jal ba dang / lha gzhan la phyag

mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba shin tu mngon du gyur pa'i dad pa'i nor gyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mngon par dang ba dang / snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid dang / legs par brtson pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / mdor na byang

chub chen por smon lam btab pa/ rgyun du sgrub par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de la dang po re zhig bris sku'i cho gar 'gyur te rgyal po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba/ ma nyams pa'i ras lhag ma min pa/ kha dog can la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug

par bya ste/ gser ltar ser ba'i gzugs brnyan chos ston par byed bzhin pa seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa lus thams cad kun nas 'bar ba'i do shal can bya'o/ /steng du ri'i rtse mor glog dang sprin dang bcas pa'o/ /'og

tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor 'od zer las byung bzhin pa bya'o/ /sgrub pa po yang gnas dang cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin dang / lag na spos phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa/ ras ris rnam pa de lta bur

bris la sgrub pa po yang dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ skye bo dang bral ba'i dben par rgyun chen por ras ris bzhugs su gsol la rnam pa thams cad du lus dang ngag dang / sems yongs su skyo ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la

mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/ zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /lo ma dang / zan dang / 'o ma dang / slong mo'i bsod snyoms kyi bza' ba dang / chu dang / phye'i bza' ba'am/ 'o ma dang nas zan bza' bar bya'o/ /a

ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i/ dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman srang gcig blangs nas bram

ze'i bu mos ba byung lnga kha byang du bltas pa 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o/ /ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas la pad+ma'i 'dab mas bkab la skam du gzhug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga bzhin du me sbar nas stong phrag rdzogs par sbyin sreg bya ste/ de nas ring

bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po rgya chen por byas te/ phyogs brgyad du pa lA sha'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i rnam par 'dren pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor byas

nas phyogs skyong ba rnams bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par rab tu sad par byed pa lag tu yungs kar thogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum par legs par grogs bzang po'am/ grogs med kyang rung ste/ sngags kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas bsrung ba bya ste/ kha shar

du phyogs pas nye bar 'dug la ku sha bting zhing bkram nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyi steng nas dang / bzhis 'og nas g.yogs te/ lag pas mnan la ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /dang po dngos grub

ni 'dis rgyal ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyan te/ gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams mthong ba de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa'i dngos grub ni glang po che dgu'i stobs dang / rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang / lo lnga brgyar 'tsho ba dang / glang po che bcu 'phrogs pa dang / rig pa

'dzin pa thams cad kyi zil gyis gnon pa ma yin pa dang 'bar zhing 'char ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba/ lus rin po ches brgyan pa/ bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gzhan 'dren par byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa zil gyis mi non pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ gsar du 'gro bzhin pa/ rlung

gi lam bdun du rnam par rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i mig sman bsten pa dang / ldong ros lag pa yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/ /de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas/ sor bcu drug pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i rnam pa bya'o/ /zlum skor du khru gang tsam

gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas/ de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rdo rje de nyid la nges par sems pas lta bzhin pa dang ldan pas rdo rje blangs te/ dur khrod du 'gro bar bya'o/ /

shar du rgyun 'bab pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun bya'o/ /chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ba byung lngas zlum skor bya'o/ /zlum skor byas nas khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas dur khrod du/ ras ris de'i

drung du rdo rje bzhag ste/ de'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan la ji srid du gong bu'i 'og gi khung bur ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas nas de nyid du lag pas rdo rje blangs nas rab tu 'jug go/ /bslangs pa'i bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gtor

mas nye bar mchod de/ khrus byas nas rdo rje de nyid la dur khrod kyi thal ba ji srid sbags par so sor gzhag go/ /cho ga 'dis dur khrod kyi sha la bzlas par bya'o/ /mthar mtshan mo gsum du cho ga bzhin du gtor ma'i mchod pa dbul bar byas nas bdag nyid dam/ grogs bzang po

la bsrung ba byas te/ lag pa gnyis kyis mnan te ji srid du dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /dngos grub dang po la gang bltas pa dang gang gis mthong ba de rnams rab tu dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa ras ris kyi sa'i rdul phyis pa tsam gyis mi

snang ba dang / glang po che stong phrag dgu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang / skal ba drug 'phrog pa dang / 'dod pas 'gro ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / rnam par snang bar byed pa dang / mthu chen por 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa la ni nyi ma 'char ka dang

mtshungs pa dang / lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing 'khor los sgyur ba yang 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i lag par rnam par rgyu ste/ de bzhin du pad+ma dang dgra sta lag pa'i cho gas yang ngo / /de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na sngon du bsnyen pa byas te lor skyes pa'i

sdigs mdzub kyi sor mo blangs nas sngar gyi cho gas mchod rten byas te dur khrod du mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas kha shar du phyogs pas rab tu zhugs la de srid du sor mo nges par rig bya ston pas mnan nas rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /nyin mo nam mkha'i rlung la

bsrung ba bya zhing / mtshan mo gnyid mi log par tho rangs ji srid du sor mo rnams dgug par bya'o/ /bkug pa'i gnas der mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa/ /ba dang be'u rgyud mtshungs pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'o ma blangs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsan+dan gyi

maN+Dal dang / mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas sa'i snod du 'o ma blug par bya zhing / thal bas kyang dkyil 'khor bcings la tho rangs khrus byas nas sngar 'di nyid kyis nges par bsrubs pa'i mar sar blangs

nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas ma reg pa zos nas mthong ba zhes bya ste/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /grol bar 'dod na gnas la phan pa'i dri thams cad la sogs pa la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos te mtshan mo

gsum du smyung bar gnas par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas rang nyid sngags zlos shing brtag par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan byas nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar ji srid du rang gi rig pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas phye mar byas nas phye ma des kun du reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma la gzugs brnyan byas te/ bdug pa'i kham phor brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang la rjes su sems

pa de dbang du byed do/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis a pA marga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /nor 'dod na ba lang gi gnas su song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis lag pas ma bzos pa'i mchod rten byas la cho ga bzhin du mchod nas gu

gul bsregs te stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/ /ba lang stong ngam nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs bsreg cing stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/ /grong bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas

nas tsan+dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang lha bshos stong phrag brgya dbul te yul gyi dpon po thob par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul te/ gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid

kyis nA ga ge sar gyi me tog stong phrag brgyar dbul bar bya ste/ ras bcos bu'i gos stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du me tog thams cad 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs nas zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te ming med

kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum skor byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na/ dang po gos bdun dang / mdor na rigs dang bcas pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten byas nas shing ad+hi ba la dza la zho dang

sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gang ston pa'i bu mo des sbyin par byed do/ /mi sbyin na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sA la'i rgyab nas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la yungs mar gyis 'di bkang nas lcags kyi thur mas phug ste tsha ba'i til

mar gyis byugs te dur khrod du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /lus gcig pa'i bud med dam/ dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa la rje rigs dang / rgyal rigs ma'o/ /gsum pa la dge slong dang / bram ze ma'o/ /zhes te mdor na ma bsgrubs par

yang las byed par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas khyad par du byas nas gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams mthong ba de thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mig sman gyis so/ /tho rangs langs nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags

pa'i chus bde bar khrus byas na gang la bltas pa de sbyin par byed cing de 'bangs su yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du til mar so la ma reg par bza' bas 'dod pas khyer ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs na don du ma gnyer bar yang bza' ba rnyed do/ /rgyal

po'i khab tu zhugs nas chos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu yongs su bzlas nas lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa bya'o/ /rgyab tu mi lta bar song na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun gyi nang du song bas kun du 'phrog par bya ba nyid la bzlas

pas gtsang bar byed do/ /gcod pa dang / 'bugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams so/ /sA lu'i 'bru dang / ka ra bIr dkar po dang / don grub dang / /kA ba rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na steng du

langs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /rims gzhom par 'dod na gi ri kad+na ka ra'i me tog la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na nyi ma bdun gyis sha za'i rims nyams par byed do/ /seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /

thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas pha rol gyi sngags rnams 'ching bar byed do/ /chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo/ /de lta bu la sogs pa'i las rnams so/ /de nas yang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang

chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de ni rigs kyi bdag po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sgrub thabs kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma

sgrol ma'i gsang chen du gyur pa sgrub pa pos gdon mi za ba kho nar dran par bya ba ste/ de sems dpa' chen po khyod la bshad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa'i don du rigs

kyi bdag po gsung du gsol/ 'dod pa phun sum tshogs byed pa/ /bcom ldan rdul mun rnam par grol/ /chags pas mngon par zhi ba dang / /byang chub nges 'byin sdig pa las/ /kun du gzigs pa'i zla ba la/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /srid pa'i sa

bon rnam 'joms par/ /phyag 'tshal mchod de khyod la brten/ /bshad bya gal te 'byung bar byed/ /slar yang srid par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ shwe te shwe teM ge shwe b+hu dze shwe ta/ mA l+ye rA laM kr-i te/ dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te a pa rA dzi te swA hA/ dran pa nyid las/

'di'i sngags kyi dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di'i sngags ni tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos gtsang mar gyur pa lan bdun byas chu bor zhugs shing thal mo sbyar te yongs su bzlas nas shar du mngon par phyogs pas

gtor bar bya'o/ /bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo / /snying khar mthe bong byin nas lan cig bzlas na lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyag rgya yang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o/ /

bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo / /snying khar mthe bong byin nas lan cig bzlas na lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyag rgya yang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas

'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ ma nyams pa'i ras skra dang bral ba 'bras bu can nam/ ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa/ stag gi pags

pa'i sham thabs can ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de yang rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/ phyag na bya ma bum thogs pa'am/ pad+ma dkar po'i 'dab ma bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi gzhogs su lha mo 'phags ma dkar mo chen mo seng ge'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag pad+ma dang / mchog

sbyin ma dang / sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing bris sku'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/ /dri zhim po'i me tog lag pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / mar gyi mar me dang / a ga ru dang / tu ruSh+ka'i bdug spos dang / gtor ma yang rig

pa 'dzin pas de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo bud+d+hA s+ya/ na mo d+harmA s+ya/ na maH saM g+ha s+ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ su ru me su ru ma/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru me karma sA d+hA ya/ bud+d+ha sad+ye na/

d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/ A gats+tsha shIg+h+rAM de ba dat+te swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i rig pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ da me da se swA hA/ dri'i rig pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hu hu hu ra hu ma hA me de swa re swA hA/ /me tog gi rig pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ me g+ha bi hra te swA hA/ bdug pa'i rig pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ tu tu tu tu tu ru

ma hA tu ru Ne swA hA/ gtor ma'i rig pa'o/ /'di rnams nyid dang mar me bdun gyi phreng ba gnas pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag bdun de srid par ro/ /rang nyid 'gul ba

dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis bil ba'i yam shing gis stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de yang dag par rdzogs par byed do/ /gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du

nye bar gnod pa med pa/ skye bo dang bral bar bye ma la mchod rten byas nas dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa phul te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/ /nyi ma so so re re zhing mchod rten bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma

'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las le'u rab 'byam bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis gzigs

nas/ yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/

tad+ya thA/ bi ma le bi ma le/ bi pu la pra b+he/ bi pu la pri ye/ bi pu la ma ti/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ twa me/ ba ru sAM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ bi pu la ma ti/ hr-i da ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bud+d+ha sat+ye na/ d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/ bo d+hi satwA sat+ye na/ bi pu

la ma ti sat+ye na/ badzra pA Ni sat+ye na/ sat+ya bA ti sat+ye na/ le le le le/ o~M o~M o~M/ b+hu ba b+hu ba b+hu ba/ ga ga ga /ma tha ma tha ma tha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a ba lo ki te/ mu tse swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan

'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ bklags pas grub pa/ bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / grong srung ba dang / ri'i 'jigs pa dang / gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sha za'i 'jigs pa dang / mdor bsdu na 'jigs pa thams cad

bklags pa tsam gyis sel bar byed do/ /'di las gzhan yang sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ da de shAn+te/ pra san+na tsi te swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shwe te sa ma ye t+ye thA/ bi shud+d+ha bsti swA hA/ gos bgos pa'i sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/

ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne/ shAn+te bi shud+d+he ga ga na ta le pu gan+d+he gan+d+ha/ u da ka ba liM tsa ha ra ha ra ka ra ka ra bi b+hu swA hA/ me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / mar me thams cad la sngags 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas

lan cig bzlas sam dbul bar bya'o/ /sa'i gong bu dkar pos rtag tu bdag nyid gtsang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la gur gum gyi chu dang / tsan+dan dang / ga pur gyi dri dang / tu ruSh+ka la sogs pa dang / a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / bal+li ka'am/ tsam pa ka'i

me tog gi phreng ba dang / 'o ma sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gro bar bya ste/ zan gyi gtor ma dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me rnams so/ /de nas 'di'i ras ris 'byung ste/ 'dod pa'i skra dang bral ba kha tshar ma bcad pa ji ltar rnyed par gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gur gum gyis bri bar bya'o/ /chu las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang phyag na pad+ma dang pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan par byas pa/ gos dkar po can mchod phyir thogs pa/ phyag mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de lta bur bri bar bya'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris zhal shar du mngon par phyogs par bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na me sbar nas sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas dus gsum du sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum rdzogs kyi bar du byas na

gang mngon par 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na gur gum dang / tsan+dan dang / me tog brgya pa dang / 'bras yos rnams gcig tu byas nas mar dang sbrang rtsis btags nas thun gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg mtha'i nyi ma la mthong

ba stsol bar byed do/ /mtshan ma 'di rnams kyang stsol te gtsug pud gyen du brdzes par 'gyur ro/ /skyon med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba 'bar ba'i ras ris rab tu sbyin pa'am smra bar byed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pas yid kyis bzlas pa bya/ nam mkhar lha'i ngag thos na

grub pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal srid slar rnyed na chos kyis byed du gzhug go/ /slar yang de nyid ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya bzhin pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to/ /na

mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha a b+hiShe ka s+ya pra dz+wa li ta dI p+ta ne pra/ b+hu dzA ya pra dz+wa li taM/ dIp+ta ha pu ka maN+Da lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hr-i da ya mA brta yi Sh+ya mi g+hu Ta/ ban d+ha d+huM d+haM d+haM d+haM d+haM/ tsa ra tsa ra ba ra ya

shasma/ o~M ka raM pra ta/ bid+yA te dza ya ma hA/ bid+yA ya ya swa yaska pra baR+ta ya ha ra Ne ra Ne ra ka ru Ne/ mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ni/ shAn+ta tsin+ta swA hA/ 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po thogs pa med pa bzlas pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo

dang rtsod pa la sogs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i rgyal po ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sgrub pa brtsams te khrus gsum byas te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /ji srid zla ba nya'i bar

du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas dpag tu med par bzlas par bya'o/ /las phran tshegs rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams ni 'di'i 'khor du gyur pa'i sngags te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA

ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bi b+hu ri bi b+hu ri/ b+hu mi/ A kA ma b+hu mi A kA ma b+hu mi A kA ma tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bi dza ya/ brta/ sha sha sha sha sha sha/ tha tha tha tha tha tha tha tha/ a kan+tha/ ak+n+d+ha/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ras ris rab tu gnas par byed pa'i sngags

so/ /dang por ri mo mkhan gyi las dang 'og tu ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/ ma 'dres pa'i kha dog gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhabs gcig gnas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /me tog sna ma'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dbyug

pa dang / ril pa spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa phrag par g.yang gzhi nag po kun du 'phyang bar bya'o/ /g.yas pas dbugs 'byin par byed pa lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas de'i spyan sngar dge slong gi tshogs la ston mo bya'o/ /yon yang ci 'byor pa dbul
